original: lto ba rlung gis sbos gyur pa //🔽nang grol dbral tam rgyu ma ni //
analyzed: lto ba rlung gis sbos gyur pa // nang grol dbral tam rgyu ma ni //
translated: The belly swells with wind,🔽and the entrails are torn inside,

original: phyi rol du ni bton te dbyung //
analyzed: phyi rol du ni bton te dbyung //
translated: or else they are pulled out and protrude from the body.

original: rked par thogs na de bzhin du //
analyzed: rked par thogs na de bzhin du //
translated: If it is stuck in the waist,

original: de yi rus tshigs dbye bar bya //
analyzed: de yi rus tshigs dbye bar bya //
translated: it will split the bones and joints.

original: rlung gi dbang gis yan lag gang //
analyzed: rlung gi dbang gis yan lag gang //
translated: Whatever limb is affected by the wind,

original: mngal du thogs pa de dang de //
analyzed: mngal du thogs pa de dang de //
translated: whether it is stuck in the womb or not,

original: dum bur gtubs la legs phyung ste //
analyzed: dum bur gtubs la legs phyung ste //
translated: should be cut into pieces and carefully removed,

original: 'bad de bud med bsrung bar bya //🔽rlung ni rnam par 'khrugs gyur pas //
analyzed: 'bad de bud med bsrung bar bya // rlung ni rnam par 'khrugs gyur pas //
translated: and the woman should be protected with effort.

original: mngal gyi gnas skabs sna tshogs byed //
analyzed: mngal gyi gnas skabs sna tshogs byed //
translated: The various conditions of the womb are created by the disturbance of the winds.

original: de phyir de ni mkhas pa yis //
analyzed: de phyir de ni mkhas pa yis //
translated: Therefore, the wise one

original: gnas skabs dag ni bltas te spyad //🔽ma dang lhan cig 'chi 'gyur bas //
analyzed: gnas skabs dag ni bltas te spyad // ma dang lhan cig 'chi 'gyur bas //
translated: should examine the conditions and act accordingly.🔽One should not kill the living fetus in the womb,

original: gson po mngal du gcad mi bya //
analyzed: gson po mngal du gcad mi bya //
translated: even if the mother is to die.🔽One should not remain indifferent for a moment

original: 'chi bar 'gyur ba dag la ni //🔽yud tsam btang snyoms gzhag mi bya //
analyzed: 'chi bar 'gyur ba dag la ni // yud tsam btang snyoms gzhag mi bya //
translated: even to those who are to die.🔽If the vagina is obstructed or damaged,

original: mo mtshan 'gags dang nyams pa dang // gzer nad dbugs kyis nyam thag dang // sgregs pa mnam dang lus grang ba'i //
analyzed: mo mtshan 'gags dang nyams pa dang // gzer nad dbugs kyis nyam thag dang // sgregs pa mnam dang lus grang ba'i //
translated: or if one is afflicted by colic or dyspnea, or if there is foul belching or a cold body,

original: mngal du bu shi bud med spang //
analyzed: mngal du bu shi bud med spang //
translated: Abandon a woman whose child dies in the womb.

original: de nas sha ma thon na //
analyzed: de nas sha ma thon na //
translated: Then, if the placenta does not come out,

original: sman pas sngon bzhin dbyung bar bya //
analyzed: sman pas sngon bzhin dbyung bar bya //
translated: the physician should remove it as before.

original: de ltar zug rngu phyung nas ni //
analyzed: de ltar zug rngu phyung nas ni //
translated: Having thus removed the obstruction,

original: chu dron gyis ni bkru bar bya //
analyzed: chu dron gyis ni bkru bar bya //
translated: wash with warm water.

original: lus la snum gyis byugs pa dang // mtshan du ras bal snum can gzhug / des ni mo mtshan 'jam 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: lus la snum gyis byugs pa dang // mtshan du ras bal snum can gzhug / des ni mo mtshan 'jam 'gyur zhing //
translated: Anoint the body with oil, and at night insert a cotton wick soaked in oil.🔽This will soften the vagina

original: de yis gzer ba zhi bar 'gyur //🔽la la phud dang bong ba dkar //
analyzed: de yis gzer ba zhi bar 'gyur // la la phud dang bong ba dkar //
translated: and relieve pain.

original: ra sna shing kun sug smel dang // tsha ba lnga yi phye ma snum ;
analyzed: ra sna shing kun sug smel dang // tsha ba lnga yi phye ma snum ;
translated: For some, give a decoction of the five hot herbs,

original: / sbyar ba'am lde gu chu bskol blud //
analyzed: / sbyar ba'am lde gu chu bskol blud //
translated: mixed with oil, or a paste boiled in water.🔽Likewise, for three days to cause the discharge of diseases

original: de bzhin nad rnams 'dzag pa dang // tshor ba zhi phyir zhag gsum ni //
analyzed: de bzhin nad rnams 'dzag pa dang // tshor ba zhi phyir zhag gsum ni //
translated: and to relieve pain,

original: pu tse shel dang bong nga dkar //
analyzed: pu tse shel dang bong nga dkar //
translated: give a decoction of pu tse, crystal, white aconite,🔽the bark of vatsaka,

original: ba sha ka yi shun pa dang // shing kun te dzo ba ti rnams //
analyzed: ba sha ka yi shun pa dang // shing kun te dzo ba ti rnams //
translated: and shing kun and tejovati,

original: btags pa'i phye ma'am bskol ba blud //
analyzed: btags pa'i phye ma'am bskol ba blud //
translated: either as a powder or boiled in water.

original: de nas zhag bdun bar du ni //
analyzed: de nas zhag bdun bar du ni //
translated: Then, for seven days,

original: @112b snum nyid nye bar btung bar bya //
analyzed: @112b snum nyid nye bar btung bar bya //
translated: drink only oil.

original: dgongs ka chang ni rnyed pa dang // de bzhin legs sbyar chang btung bya //
analyzed: dgongs ka chang ni rnyed pa dang // de bzhin legs sbyar chang btung bya //
translated: In the evening, one should drink wine that has been obtained and well prepared.

original: shirsha ka ku bar bskol spangs //
analyzed: shirsha ka ku bar bskol spangs //
translated: One should avoid boiled Śirīṣa and cucumber.🔽One should insert cotton into the vagina.

original: ras bal mo mtshan nang du gzhug / bla brnan gzhan dag gang byung ba //
analyzed: ras bal mo mtshan nang du gzhug / bla brnan gzhan dag gang byung ba //
translated: Whatever other head afflictions occur,

original: de la rang gis gso bas gso //
analyzed: de la rang gis gso bas gso //
translated: one should treat them oneself.

original: rlung 'joms sman ni 'o mar bskol //
analyzed: rlung 'joms sman ni 'o mar bskol //
translated: The medicine that conquers wind is boiled in milk.

original: zhag bcu'i bar du bza' ba phan /
analyzed: zhag bcu'i bar du bza' ba phan /
translated: Eating it for ten days is beneficial.

original: zhag bcu'i bar du sha khu btung //
analyzed: zhag bcu'i bar du sha khu btung //
translated: For ten days, one should drink meat broth.

original: de phan chad ni yang zhing phan //
analyzed: de phan chad ni yang zhing phan //
translated: After that, it is beneficial to be light.

original: nyung du bza' zhing snum bsku dugs //
analyzed: nyung du bza' zhing snum bsku dugs //
translated: One should eat little and apply oil and ointment.

original: ba la'i til mar la sogs bsten //
analyzed: ba la'i til mar la sogs bsten //
translated: One should rely on sesame oil from the Bālaka plant, and so on.

original: zla ba bzhi lon phan chad de //
analyzed: zla ba bzhi lon phan chad de //
translated: After four months have passed,

original: de ni rim gyis ci bder spyad //
analyzed: de ni rim gyis ci bder spyad //
translated: one should gradually do whatever is comfortable.

original: ba lo'i rtsa ba'i khu ba ni /
analyzed: ba lo'i rtsa ba'i khu ba ni /
translated: The juice of the root of the Bālaka plant,

original: cha drug 'o ma de mnyam dang // nas dang rgya shug ku langtha //
analyzed: cha drug 'o ma de mnyam dang // nas dang rgya shug ku langtha //
translated: six parts of milk, an equal amount of barley and jujube,🔽one part of the ten roots,

original: rtsa ba bcu pa'i cha gcig dang // bskol ba'i cha ni char byas pa'i //
analyzed: rtsa ba bcu pa'i cha gcig dang // bskol ba'i cha ni char byas pa'i //
translated: and the boiled part made into a portion,🔽fourteen parts of sesame oil,

original: til mar cha ni bcu bzhi dang // med gnyis dang thang shing bcod //
analyzed: til mar cha ni bcu bzhi dang // med gnyis dang thang shing bcod //
translated: two parts of resin and cut sandalwood,

original: ra mnye ba gnyis tsandan dang // tal tre sa ru rta dzo ba la //
analyzed: ra mnye ba gnyis tsandan dang // tal tre sa ru rta dzo ba la //
translated: The two ra nye, tsa nda na, ta ltre, sa ru, rta jo, ba la,

analyzed: rgya spos rgyam tsha thangs rtsi ba // gla sgang rdo dreg shu dag dang // bu rna rna ba aa ka ru //
translated: and gya spos, rgyam tsha, tha ngs rtsi.🔽La gang, rdo drek, shu dag, and bu rna, rna ba, a ka ru,🔽a shva, ga ndha, nye shing, and kshi ra, ku shu, shing mar,🔽ba la, re shu ti, and the two pa rni, sug smel,

original: aa shva gandha nye shing dang // kshi ra ku shu shen mngar dang // ba la ras shu ti dang // pa rni gnyis dang sug smel dang // shing tsha gandha bhar dra rnams //
analyzed: aa shva gandha nye shing dang // kshi ra ku shu shen mngar dang // ba la ras shu ti dang // pa rni gnyis dang sug smel dang // shing tsha gandha bhar dra rnams //
translated: and shing tsa, ga ndha, bhar dra.🔽The paste of these finely ground,

original: zhib tu btags pa'i lde gu dang // til mar me chung la bskol ba //
analyzed: zhib tu btags pa'i lde gu dang // til mar me chung la bskol ba //
translated: boiled in sesame oil over a low fire,🔽is the best remedy for all types of wind disorders,

original: rlung nad thams cad sel ba'i mchog / bu btsas byis pa rus pa gnad //
analyzed: rlung nad thams cad sel ba'i mchog / bu btsas byis pa rus pa gnad //
translated: and is praised for newborn babies, children, bone pain,

original: snang dang skem la bsngags pa yin //
analyzed: snang dang skem la bsngags pa yin //
translated: and for those with appearance and emaciation.🔽It cures contagious tumors, evil spirits, depression,

original: rims skran gdon dang skyo byed dang // gcin nad rgyu ma skyes bsel //🔽thang pha 'bar gyi mngal gyi ni //
analyzed: rims skran gdon dang skyo byed dang // gcin nad rgyu ma skyes bsel // thang pha 'bar gyi mngal gyi ni //
translated: urinary diseases, and intestinal disorders.🔽It is said to be the best remedy

original: nad rnams sel ba'i mchog tu bshad //🔽ma ni gi tshe chu sor ni //
analyzed: nad rnams sel ba'i mchog tu bshad // ma ni gi tshe chu sor ni //
translated: for the diseases of the womb of a barren woman.🔽If ma ni ki resides in the fingers,

original: rang la gnas gal te dkur 'phar na //
analyzed: rang la gnas gal te dkur 'phar na //
translated: and if there is a twitching of the shoulder,

original: de ni skye ba'i dus yin pas //
analyzed: de ni skye ba'i dus yin pas //
translated: That is the time of birth,

original: dpral te byis pa myur du dbyung //
analyzed: dpral te byis pa myur du dbyung //
translated: so the child should be quickly removed.🔽The seeds of śārika,

original: sha ri ka yi sa bon dang // pa ya sya dang thang shing bzhi //
analyzed: sha ri ka yi sa bon dang // pa ya sya dang thang shing bzhi //
translated: pāyasya, and the four🔽black sesame, the root of sṛṣa,

analyzed: til nag sru sru'i rtsa ba dang // btso ra dang nye'u shing zhes bya bzhi //
translated: and the one called nehuśiṅ.

original: bri sha dang ni pa ya sya /
analyzed: bri sha dang ni pa ya sya /
translated: Bṛhatī, pāyasya,

original: autpal zal tres bri yang ku //
analyzed: autpal zal tres bri yang ku //
translated: utpala, zaltre, bṛyaṅku,🔽bītsaṅ, thaltre, rasnā,🔽padma, carī, sweet wood,🔽bṛhatī, palāśa,

analyzed: byi tshang thal tres ra sna dang // padma tsa ri shing mngar dang // bri ha ti gnyis dang pal dang // 'o shing myu gu shun pa dmar /
translated: the sprouts of sugarcane, and red bark,🔽kṛṣṇapāṇi, bala,

original: krishna pa rni ba la dang // shi kru gze ma sle tres dang // shring ga sta rga rgun pad rtsa //
analyzed: krishna pa rni ba la dang // shi kru gze ma sle tres dang // shring ga sta rga rgun pad rtsa //
translated: śikṣu, cumin, leṭra,🔽śṛṅga, staka, grapes, lotus root,

original: shing mngar kha ra ka she ru //
analyzed: shing mngar kha ra ka she ru //
translated: sweet wood, and karakaru.

original: tshigs @113a * //
analyzed: tshigs @113a * //
translated: The seven are mixed with milk

original: bcad phyed kyis rdzogs bshad pa'i //
analyzed: bcad phyed kyis rdzogs bshad pa'i //
translated: and explained in half a verse.

original: bdun pa 'di dag 'o mar sbyar //
analyzed: bdun pa 'di dag 'o mar sbyar //
translated: These seven should be applied

original: zla ba bdun la rim bzhin du //
analyzed: zla ba bdun la rim bzhin du //
translated: in order over seven months

original: mngal 'dzag pa la gtang bar bya //
analyzed: mngal 'dzag pa la gtang bar bya //
translated: to stop miscarriages.

original: ka pi ta dang bil ba dang // bri ha ti dang bu ram dang // kanda ka ri pa to l'i //
analyzed: ka pi ta dang bil ba dang // bri ha ti dang bu ram dang // kanda ka ri pa to l'i //
translated: brihati, gur, kandali, patola,🔽and the roots of the above, boiled in milk,

original: rtsa ba bskol bar byas pa dang // de bzhin 'o ma sha rnams ni //
analyzed: rtsa ba bskol bar byas pa dang // de bzhin 'o ma sha rnams ni //
translated: and likewise meat,

original: zla ba brgyad pa'i tshe na 'ang btang //
analyzed: zla ba brgyad pa'i tshe na 'ang btang //
translated: are given in the eighth month.🔽In the ninth, thallasa, eranda,

original: dgu par thal tres ae rna dang // pa ya sya mngar gtang //
analyzed: dgu par thal tres ae rna dang // pa ya sya mngar gtang //
translated: and madhupa are given.

original: zla ba bcu par pa ya sya //
analyzed: zla ba bcu par pa ya sya //
translated: In the tenth month, madhupa

original: 'o ma dang ni bskol ba blud //
analyzed: 'o ma dang ni bskol ba blud //
translated: is given boiled in milk.🔽Or one should give madhuka, dongka,

original: yang na shing mngar dong gra dang // thang shing 'o mar sbyar ba sbyin //
analyzed: yang na shing mngar dong gra dang // thang shing 'o mar sbyar ba sbyin //
translated: and pine boiled in milk.

original: bud med mngal du rlung gis khrag bsgongs te //
analyzed: bud med mngal du rlung gis khrag bsgongs te //
translated: If the wind in the womb of a woman coagulates the blood,

original: gnas pa de ni mngal chags cha 'dra bas //
analyzed: gnas pa de ni mngal chags cha 'dra bas //
translated: and it remains there, it resembles a fetus.

original: bu chags yin zhes mi mkhas pa dag smra //
analyzed: bu chags yin zhes mi mkhas pa dag smra //
translated: The unwise say, “She is pregnant.”

original: sman kha rno dros khrag ni 'ba' zhig zags //
analyzed: sman kha rno dros khrag ni 'ba' zhig zags //
translated: The sharp and hot medicine only causes bleeding.

original: blun pos mngal gnas 'byung pos zos zhes zer //🔽mdangs 'phrog yin phyir de lus mngon sum du //
analyzed: blun pos mngal gnas 'byung pos zos zhes zer // mdangs 'phrog yin phyir de lus mngon sum du //
translated: The fool says, “The fetus in the womb is eaten by a ghost.”🔽Because it steals radiance, the body is not visible.

original: 'phrog par mi snang ba 'am 'byung po ni //
analyzed: 'phrog par mi snang ba 'am 'byung po ni //
translated: The ghost is not seen stealing it.

original: gzhung 'dor ma ni btang snyoms 'jog mi byed //
analyzed: gzhung 'dor ma ni btang snyoms 'jog mi byed //
translated: The one who abandons the scriptures is not one who rests in equanimity.

original: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las /
analyzed: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las /
translated: From the Compendium of the Essence of the Eight Branches,

original: lus kyi gnas kyi le'u gnyis pa'o /
analyzed: lus kyi gnas kyi le'u gnyis pa'o /
translated: the second chapter on the location of the body.

original: // / de nas lus kyi yan lag gi bye brag bstan pa bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: // / de nas lus kyi yan lag gi bye brag bstan pa bshad par bya'o //
translated: Now, the specific branches of the body will be explained.

original: mdor na yan lag rnam drug ste ;
analyzed: mdor na yan lag rnam drug ste ;
translated: In brief, there are six branches:

original: ; mgo dang khog pa dpung pa gnyis //🔽brla gnyis yin te de'i nying lag //
analyzed: ; mgo dang khog pa dpung pa gnyis // brla gnyis yin te de'i nying lag //
translated: the head, the torso, the two shoulders,🔽and the two thighs.

original: mig snying lag pa rkang ba stsogs //
analyzed: mig snying lag pa rkang ba stsogs //
translated: The secondary branches are the eyes, heart, hands, feet, and so forth.

original: sgra dang reg bya gzugs ro dri //🔽go rims bzhin du nam mkha' rlung //
analyzed: sgra dang reg bya gzugs ro dri // go rims bzhin du nam mkha' rlung //
translated: Sound, touch, form, taste, and smell🔽are the qualities of space, wind,

original: me chu sa yi yon tan yin //
analyzed: me chu sa yi yon tan yin //
translated: fire, water, and earth, respectively.

original: yon tan re res phyi ma skyed //
analyzed: yon tan re res phyi ma skyed //
translated: Each quality produces the next.

original: de la mkha' las lus bu ga ;
analyzed: de la mkha' las lus bu ga ;
translated: From space, the body's cavities

original: ; rna ba sgra dang khong stong nyid //
analyzed: ; rna ba sgra dang khong stong nyid //
translated: and the ears, sound, and emptiness of the abdomen.

original: rlung las reg pa lpags dbugs 'byin //
analyzed: rlung las reg pa lpags dbugs 'byin //
translated: From wind, touch, skin, and exhalation.

original: me las mig dang gzugs 'ju nyid //🔽chu las lce dang ro dang gsher //
analyzed: me las mig dang gzugs 'ju nyid // chu las lce dang ro dang gsher //
translated: From fire, the eyes, form, and digestion.🔽From water, the tongue, taste, and fluidity.

original: sa las sna dri rus pa yin //
analyzed: sa las sna dri rus pa yin //
translated: From earth, the nose, smell, and bones.

original: 'dir ni ma las skyes 'jam khrag //
analyzed: 'dir ni ma las skyes 'jam khrag //
translated: Here, from mother, birth, flesh, and blood.

original: sha dang rkang dang gzhang kha stsogs //
analyzed: sha dang rkang dang gzhang kha stsogs //
translated: Flesh, bones, intestines, and so forth🔽are from the father’s semen and the mother’s blood.🔽The great channels, bones, hair, and so forth

original: pha skyes brtan dang khu chu dang ; ; rtsa bo che rus skra stsogs yin //
analyzed: pha skyes brtan dang khu chu dang ; ; rtsa bo che rus skra stsogs yin //
translated: are from the father’s semen.

original: sems las sems byung dbang po rnams //
analyzed: sems las sems byung dbang po rnams //
translated: The mind and mental factors and the sense faculties

original: skye gnas sna tshogs rnams kyang 'byung //
analyzed: skye gnas sna tshogs rnams kyang 'byung //
translated: arise from the various birthplaces.

original: goms pa las byung nad med tshe //
analyzed: goms pa las byung nad med tshe //
translated: From habituation, health, and life

original: le lo med stobs gzi mdangs yin //
analyzed: le lo med stobs gzi mdangs yin //
translated: come diligence, strength, and radiance.🔽From the pure essence, the body’s flexibility,

original: dangs ma las byung lus kyed dang // gnas dang 'phel dang mi brkam nyid //
analyzed: dangs ma las byung lus kyed dang // gnas dang 'phel dang mi brkam nyid //
translated: the sense bases, growth, and non-greed.

original: @113b snying stobs can tsang yod par lta //
analyzed: @113b snying stobs can tsang yod par lta //
translated: See the sattva as existing in the heart.

original: chos dkar la dga' blo gros ldan //
analyzed: chos dkar la dga' blo gros ldan //
translated: It is endowed with intelligence and delights in virtuous qualities.🔽The rajas is the many hairs, pride, hypocrisy, anger, and envy.

original: rdul can mang du skra ba dang // nga rgyal tshul 'chos khro phrag dog / mun pa 'jigs dang mi shes dang // gnyid dang le lo skyo bo'o //
analyzed: rdul can mang du skra ba dang // nga rgyal tshul 'chos khro phrag dog / mun pa 'jigs dang mi shes dang // gnyid dang le lo skyo bo'o //
translated: The tamas is darkness, fear, ignorance, sleep, laziness, and depression.

original: de ltar 'byung ba'i rang bzhin lus //
analyzed: de ltar 'byung ba'i rang bzhin lus //
translated: Thus, the body is the nature of the elements.

original: de la khrag skyes lpags rim bdun 'o ma las ni spris ma bzhin //
analyzed: de la khrag skyes lpags rim bdun 'o ma las ni spris ma bzhin //
translated: On that, the skin grows from the blood, in seven layers, like the skin that forms on the top of boiled milk when it cools.

original: smin pa'i tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: smin pa'i tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: When it ripens, it becomes the body.

original: lus zungs gnas ni nad gsher gyi //
analyzed: lus zungs gnas ni nad gsher gyi //
translated: The bodily constituents are the locations of the humors.

original: rang gi drod kyis smin pas na //
analyzed: rang gi drod kyis smin pas na //
translated: They are ripened by one’s own heat.

original: bad kan rgyus pa shams g-yogs //
analyzed: bad kan rgyus pa shams g-yogs //
translated: Phlegm covers the sinews and muscles.

original: char bshad shing gi snying po 'dra //
analyzed: char bshad shing gi snying po 'dra //
translated: It is like the pith of a rain tree.

original: bdun pa de dag gnas bdun te //
analyzed: bdun pa de dag gnas bdun te //
translated: The seventh is the seven locations.

original: dang por khrag yin ba dan rim bzhin //
analyzed: dang por khrag yin ba dan rim bzhin //
translated: The first is blood, and then in order:

original: bad kan ma zhu mkhris zhu ba //
analyzed: bad kan ma zhu mkhris zhu ba //
translated: phlegm, undigested bile,

original: rlung dang gcin gyi gnas su bshad //
analyzed: rlung dang gcin gyi gnas su bshad //
translated: and the locations of wind and urine are explained.

original: bud med mngal gnas brgyad pa ste //
analyzed: bud med mngal gnas brgyad pa ste //
translated: The eighth is the womb location of a woman.

original: mkhris pa zhu ba'i gnas par gnas //
analyzed: mkhris pa zhu ba'i gnas par gnas //
translated: It is located in the location of digested bile.

original: 'di la nang 'grol yan lag gnas //🔽snying glo mchin mkhris mcher mkhal ma //
analyzed: 'di la nang 'grol yan lag gnas // snying glo mchin mkhris mcher mkhal ma //
translated: In this there are the internal branch locations:🔽heart, lungs, liver, gall bladder, spleen, and kidneys.

analyzed: gnyer ma'i tshogs dang skra dkar mig sngo'i gnas gyur la //

original: zas ni mngar dang bska dang kha bsil za bar dga' //
analyzed: zas ni mngar dang bska dang kha bsil za bar dga' //
translated: He likes to eat sweet, astringent, sour, and cold food.

original: than pa mi bzod rdul zhing dring la //
analyzed: than pa mi bzod rdul zhing dring la //
translated: He cannot tolerate heat, is dusty, and is fickle.

original: bshang gci bza' btung khra dang phrag dog mang //
analyzed: bshang gci bza' btung khra dang phrag dog mang //
translated: Eating feces and urine, drinking from the same vessel, and jealousy are many.

original: rmi lam dod ka ba la sha'i me tog / glog 'gyur phyogs tshig skar mda' nyi me mthong //
analyzed: rmi lam dod ka ba la sha'i me tog / glog 'gyur phyogs tshig skar mda' nyi me mthong //
translated: In dreams, seeing a tree with flesh-flowers, lightning, a burning direction, a shooting star, and the sun.🔽This one has a subtle body, moving yellow eyes, thin and few eyelashes, and likes cold things.

original: 'di yis lus phra mig ser g-yo ba dang // rdzi ma srab cing nyung zhing grang la dga' / khro dang chang dang nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis //
analyzed: 'di yis lus phra mig ser g-yo ba dang // rdzi ma srab cing nyung zhing grang la dga' / khro dang chang dang nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis //
translated: Anger, alcohol, and the light of the sun

original: mig ni myur bar dmar por @117a * //🔽'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: mig ni myur bar dmar por @117a * // 'gyur ba yin //
translated: quickly turn the eyes red.🔽At the time of life, being of medium strength, and having little endurance for suffering,

original: tshe na ran cing stobs ni 'bring ba dang // mkhas shing sdug bsngal dag la sran chung 'gyur //
analyzed: tshe na ran cing stobs ni 'bring ba dang // mkhas shing sdug bsngal dag la sran chung 'gyur //
translated: one becomes wise.

original: stag dang sbre'u byil dang // gnod sbyin rang bzhin ldan ba mkhris can yin //
analyzed: stag dang sbre'u byil dang // gnod sbyin rang bzhin ldan ba mkhris can yin //
translated: Tigers, monkeys, and yakshas with natural bile are of the bile type.

original: bad kan bsil bas bad kan can bsil zhing //
analyzed: bad kan bsil bas bad kan can bsil zhing //
translated: The phlegm type is cool due to the cooling phlegm.

original: rus tshigs mi mngon snum zhing sha rus 'brel //
analyzed: rus tshigs mi mngon snum zhing sha rus 'brel //
translated: The joints are not prominent, the body is oily, and the flesh and bones are connected.

original: bkres skom nyon mongs sdug bsngal than pa bzod //
analyzed: bkres skom nyon mongs sdug bsngal than pa bzod //
translated: One endures hunger, thirst, afflictions, suffering, and heat.

original: blo ldan snying stobs che zhing dam bca' brtan //
analyzed: blo ldan snying stobs che zhing dam bca' brtan //
translated: The wise one has great courage and firm commitments.

original: phri yang ku dang d'ur ba 'dam bu'i mdog //
analyzed: phri yang ku dang d'ur ba 'dam bu'i mdog //
translated: The color of the body is like the color of the lotus,🔽the color of the partridge, the color of the duck, the color of the lotus,

original: tshon dang gi'u dang padma gser mdog can //
analyzed: tshon dang gi'u dang padma gser mdog can //
translated: the color of gold.

original: lag ngar ring zhing drang ni yang sa la rgyas //
analyzed: lag ngar ring zhing drang ni yang sa la rgyas //
translated: The arms are long, straight, and full.

original: 'phral ba'i dbyes che skra ni mthug ching gnag //
analyzed: 'phral ba'i dbyes che skra ni mthug ching gnag //
translated: The forehead is broad, the hair is thick and black.🔽The body is smooth, the limbs are beautiful,

original: lus 'jam snyoms shing yan lag mdzes pa dang // mdangs che khu bcud bu tsha g-yog 'khor mang //
analyzed: lus 'jam snyoms shing yan lag mdzes pa dang // mdangs che khu bcud bu tsha g-yog 'khor mang //
translated: the complexion is clear, the essence is strong, the children and retinue are many.

original: chos ldan tshig rtsub nam yang smra mi byed //
analyzed: chos ldan tshig rtsub nam yang smra mi byed //
translated: The one who has the Dharma never speaks harsh words.

original: dgra la zhe sdang 'dam rings khon 'dzin byed //
analyzed: dgra la zhe sdang 'dam rings khon 'dzin byed //
translated: He does not have hatred for enemies, nor does he hold grudges.

original: glang po'i mchog dregs bcas pa lta bur 'gro //🔽rgya mtsho 'brug dang rdza rnga seng ge yi //
analyzed: glang po'i mchog dregs bcas pa lta bur 'gro // rgya mtsho 'brug dang rdza rnga seng ge yi //
translated: He walks like the most arrogant of elephants.🔽He has the voice of the ocean, the thunder, the war drum, and the lion.

original: sgra ldan dran dang brtson 'grus dul bar ldan //
analyzed: sgra ldan dran dang brtson 'grus dul bar ldan //
translated: He is endowed with mindfulness, diligence, and discipline.

original: byis pa'i tshe na'ang du dang skom shas chung //
analyzed: byis pa'i tshe na'ang du dang skom shas chung //
translated: Even as a child, he has little crying and thirst.

original: zas ni kha bska cha dang dro zhing rtsub //
analyzed: zas ni kha bska cha dang dro zhing rtsub //
translated: His food is bitter, sour, and hot, and he eats little.

original: nyung ngu zos kyang de ni stobs dang ldan //
analyzed: nyung ngu zos kyang de ni stobs dang ldan //
translated: But even though he eats little, he is strong.

original: mig gi mtha' dmar snum zhing dkyus ring yangs //
analyzed: mig gi mtha' dmar snum zhing dkyus ring yangs //
translated: The eyes are red, shiny, long, and wide.

original: dkar nag rab gsal rdzi ma snyoms dang ldan //
analyzed: dkar nag rab gsal rdzi ma snyoms dang ldan //
translated: The eyelashes are even, with a clear white and black.

original: smra dang khro dang bza' btung spyod pa nyung //
analyzed: smra dang khro dang bza' btung spyod pa nyung //
translated: Speech, anger, eating, and drinking are moderate.

original: tshe ring nor mang ring lta tshig 'jam smra //
analyzed: tshe ring nor mang ring lta tshig 'jam smra //
translated: Long-lived, with much wealth, distant views, soft speech,

original: dad cing blo zab lta che bzod dang ldan //
analyzed: dad cing blo zab lta che bzod dang ldan //
translated: Faithful, with deep mind, great views, and patience.

original: rang bzhin bzang zhing gnyid che las mtha' ring //
analyzed: rang bzhin bzang zhing gnyid che las mtha' ring //
translated: Naturally good, with much sleep, distant work,

original: byas gzo drang mkhas skal bzang ngo tshar ldan //
analyzed: byas gzo drang mkhas skal bzang ngo tshar ldan //
translated: Repaying kindness, honest, skilled, fortunate, and modest.

original: bla ma la gus mdza' bshes dag la brten //
analyzed: bla ma la gus mdza' bshes dag la brten //
translated: Respectful to gurus, relying on friends and relatives,

original: rmi lam padma bya yi phreng bar bcas //
analyzed: rmi lam padma bya yi phreng bar bcas //
translated: In dreams, seeing lotuses, garlands of birds,

original: chu yi gnas dang spyin yang mthong ba yin //
analyzed: chu yi gnas dang spyin yang mthong ba yin //
translated: Water-dwellers, and gifts.🔽Brahma, Rudra, Indra, Varuna,

original: tshangs pa drag po dbang po chu lha dang // nam mkha' lding dang ngang ba glang po mchog //
analyzed: tshangs pa drag po dbang po chu lha dang // nam mkha' lding dang ngang ba glang po mchog //
translated: Garuda, geese, excellent elephants,

original: de bzhin seng ge dang ni khyu mchog dang // bad kan can ni rang bzhin 'drar shes bya //🔽rang bzhin gnyis dang kun las byung //
analyzed: de bzhin seng ge dang ni khyu mchog dang // bad kan can ni rang bzhin 'drar shes bya // rang bzhin gnyis dang kun las byung //
translated: Likewise lions, bulls, and phlegm-dominant persons should be known as similar in nature.🔽The natures are twofold and arise from all.

original: gnyis gnyis kun gyi yon tan bskyed //
analyzed: gnyis gnyis kun gyi yon tan bskyed //
translated: The qualities of each pair are produced by all.

original: gtsang sbra yod par smra stsogs kyi //
analyzed: gtsang sbra yod par smra stsogs kyi //
translated: Those with purity speak and so forth.

original: yon tan gyis ni de ldan bshad //
analyzed: yon tan gyis ni de ldan bshad //
translated: The one who possesses these qualities is a teacher.

original: na tshod bcu drug par byis pa //
analyzed: na tshod bcu drug par byis pa //
translated: The child is up to the age of sixteen.

original: de las lus zungs dbang po gzi //
analyzed: de las lus zungs dbang po gzi //
translated: From then until the body and faculties are fully developed, one is a youth.

original: 'phel @117b 'gyur bdun cu'i bar bar ma //🔽zad pa phan chad rgan po yin //
analyzed: 'phel @117b 'gyur bdun cu'i bar bar ma // zad pa phan chad rgan po yin //
translated: From the age of seventy, one is old.

original: rang rang khru ni phyed dang bzhi //
analyzed: rang rang khru ni phyed dang bzhi //
translated: Each is one cubit and four finger-widths.

original: lus ni tshe ring bde ba'i snod //
analyzed: lus ni tshe ring bde ba'i snod //
translated: The body is a vessel for long life and happiness.

original: spu med gnag dang shin tu sbom //
analyzed: spu med gnag dang shin tu sbom //
translated: Without hair, black, and very plump,

original: ring po nyid ni mi mthun bcas //
analyzed: ring po nyid ni mi mthun bcas //
translated: tallness is not suitable.

original: smad pa brgyad dang rang nyid ldan //
analyzed: smad pa brgyad dang rang nyid ldan //
translated: The eight despised ones are possessed by oneself.

original: gang yin de ni de snod min //
analyzed: gang yin de ni de snod min //
translated: Whoever has them is not a vessel for that.🔽Hair is very soft,

original: skra ni rab tu 'jam pa dang // phra zhing rtsa ba ma 'dres brtan //
analyzed: skra ni rab tu 'jam pa dang // phra zhing rtsa ba ma 'dres brtan //
translated: fine, rooted firmly, and not mixed.

original: dpral ba mtho zhing mur 'gram 'phyar //
analyzed: dpral ba mtho zhing mur 'gram 'phyar //
translated: The forehead is high, and the temples are full.

original: zla ba kham pa 'ang ba bzang //
analyzed: zla ba kham pa 'ang ba bzang //
translated: A full moon and a half-moon are good.

original: rna brgyab phyogs rgya che mdzes //
analyzed: rna brgyab phyogs rgya che mdzes //
translated: The ears are large and beautiful.

original: rna shal che zhing sha yis rgyas //
analyzed: rna shal che zhing sha yis rgyas //
translated: The earlobes are large and full of flesh.🔽The eyes are black and white,

original: mig ni dkar nag 'byes pa dang // rdzi ma stug cing snyoms pa bzang //
analyzed: mig ni dkar nag 'byes pa dang // rdzi ma stug cing snyoms pa bzang //
translated: with thick and even eyelashes.

original: sna yi rtse mo dbugs cher 'byung //
analyzed: sna yi rtse mo dbugs cher 'byung //
translated: The tip of the nose is where the breath comes out.

original: sha rgyas drang zhing snyoms pa bzang //
analyzed: sha rgyas drang zhing snyoms pa bzang //
translated: Well-rounded, with full flesh, straight, and good.

original: mchu ni dmar zhing ma 'phyangs pa //
analyzed: mchu ni dmar zhing ma 'phyangs pa //
translated: The lips are red, not hanging down,

original: 'gram pa yang shing mi 'bur bzang //
analyzed: 'gram pa yang shing mi 'bur bzang //
translated: and the cheeks are not sunken, good.

original: kha che so yi tshigs dam la //
analyzed: kha che so yi tshigs dam la //
translated: The mouth is large, with firm teeth,

original: snum zhing dkar la 'jam zhing snyoms //
analyzed: snum zhing dkar la 'jam zhing snyoms //
translated: oily, white, smooth, and even.

original: lce ni dmar zhing yangs la srab //🔽ko sko che zhing sha yis rgyas //
analyzed: lce ni dmar zhing yangs la srab // ko sko che zhing sha yis rgyas //
translated: The tongue is red, broad, and thin,🔽and the chin is large and full of flesh.

original: mgrin pa zung zhing sha rgyas zlum //🔽phrag pa mthong zhing sha yis rgyas //
analyzed: mgrin pa zung zhing sha rgyas zlum // phrag pa mthong zhing sha yis rgyas //
translated: The throat is round and full of flesh,🔽and the shoulders are high and full of flesh.

original: lto ba zlum zhing lte ba ni //
analyzed: lto ba zlum zhing lte ba ni //
translated: The belly is round, and the navel

original: zab cing mtho la g-yas su 'khyil //
analyzed: zab cing mtho la g-yas su 'khyil //
translated: is deep, high, and turns to the right.

original: rkang pa lag pa legs gnas shing //
analyzed: rkang pa lag pa legs gnas shing //
translated: The legs and arms are well-placed,

original: sen mo 'jam zhing mtho la dmar //
analyzed: sen mo 'jam zhing mtho la dmar //
translated: and the nails are smooth, high, and red.

original: snum zhing kun dmar sha rgyas pa //
analyzed: snum zhing kun dmar sha rgyas pa //
translated: Oily, all red, full of flesh,

original: sor mo ring zlum bug med //
analyzed: sor mo ring zlum bug med //
translated: the fingers are long, round, and without gaps.

original: rgyab zhing che zhing sgal tshigs nub //
analyzed: rgyab zhing che zhing sgal tshigs nub //
translated: The back is large and the spine is hidden,🔽the joints are not visible, and the joints

original: tshigs mtshams mi mngon dam pa dang // tshigs gsang mtho zhing brtan pa dang // mdog snum kha dog brtan par gnas //
analyzed: tshigs mtshams mi mngon dam pa dang // tshigs gsang mtho zhing brtan pa dang // mdog snum kha dog brtan par gnas //
translated: are high and firm, the color is oily, and the complexion remains stable.

original: rang bzhin gyis 'byung snying stobs brtan //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis 'byung snying stobs brtan //
translated: Naturally occurring, courageous,

original: phongs pa'i tshe n'ang zhum pa med //
analyzed: phongs pa'i tshe n'ang zhum pa med //
translated: and not discouraged even in times of poverty.

original: mngal nas brtsams te nad med pa //
analyzed: mngal nas brtsams te nad med pa //
translated: Beginning from the womb, free of illness,

original: gong nas gong du zhing bzang la //
analyzed: gong nas gong du zhing bzang la //
translated: in fields that are better and better,

original: shes dang ye shes rgya cher ni //
analyzed: shes dang ye shes rgya cher ni //
translated: knowledge and wisdom increase

original: 'phel zhing rim gyis dge bar 'gyur //
analyzed: 'phel zhing rim gyis dge bar 'gyur //
translated: and gradually become virtuous.

original: de ltar yon tan kun ldan pa'i //
analyzed: de ltar yon tan kun ldan pa'i //
translated: Thus, with all good qualities,

original: lus ni ston brgya'i bar dag tu //🔽tshe dang dbang phyug 'dod pa yi //
analyzed: lus ni ston brgya'i bar dag tu // tshe dang dbang phyug 'dod pa yi //
translated: the body remains for a hundred eons🔽with life, power, and all things

original: dngos po thams cad rab tu gnas //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad rab tu gnas //
translated: desired.

original: bags pa khrag stsogs snying stobs par //
analyzed: bags pa khrag stsogs snying stobs par //
translated: The skin, blood, and so forth are courage.

original: brgyad po phyi ma bzhin du mchog //
analyzed: brgyad po phyi ma bzhin du mchog //
translated: The eight are supreme in the latter.

original: stobs dang tshad dang shes pa'i phyir //
analyzed: stobs dang tshad dang shes pa'i phyir //
translated: Because of strength, size, and knowledge,

original: lus can rnams kyi snying por bshad //
analyzed: lus can rnams kyi snying por bshad //
translated: it is explained as the essence of embodied beings.

original: snying po kun dang ldan pa yi //🔽mchog tu bkur bar @118a * //
analyzed: snying po kun dang ldan pa yi // mchog tu bkur bar @118a * //
translated: Endowed with all essences,

original: bya bar 'gyur //
analyzed: bya bar 'gyur //
translated: it becomes most venerable.🔽All undertakings are hopeful,

original: rtsom pa kun la'ang re bcas dang // bzod ldan blo bzang brtan par 'gyur //
analyzed: rtsom pa kun la'ang re bcas dang // bzod ldan blo bzang brtan par 'gyur //
translated: patient, intelligent, and stable.

original: dregs dang zhum pa med par ni //
analyzed: dregs dang zhum pa med par ni //
translated: Without arrogance or discouragement,

original: bde dang sbug bsngal bsten gyur ba //
analyzed: bde dang sbug bsngal bsten gyur ba //
translated: One who is endowed with courage is happy and is not afflicted by suffering.

original: snying stobs can yin rdul can khengs //
analyzed: snying stobs can yin rdul can khengs //
translated: One who is endowed with passion is arrogant.

original: mun pa can ni de ltar min //
analyzed: mun pa can ni de ltar min //
translated: One who is endowed with darkness is not like that.🔽Generosity, morality, compassion, happiness,

original: sbyin dang tshul khrims snying brtse bde ni //🔽tshangs par spyod dang byas pa gzo //
analyzed: sbyin dang tshul khrims snying brtse bde ni // tshangs par spyod dang byas pa gzo //
translated: pure conduct, gratitude,

original: byams ldan bcud kyis len ba sten pa //
analyzed: byams ldan bcud kyis len ba sten pa //
translated: and love are the nourishment of the life force.

original: tshe dang bsod nams 'phel ba'i sde'o //🔽yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las //
analyzed: tshe dang bsod nams 'phel ba'i sde'o // yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las //
translated: This is the chapter on the increase of life and merit.

original: lus kyi gnas kyi le'u gsum po'o /
analyzed: lus kyi gnas kyi le'u gsum po'o /
translated: This concludes the three chapters on the abode of the body from the Compendium on the Essence of the Eight Branches.

original: // / de nas lus kyi gnad kyi bye brag bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: // / de nas lus kyi gnad kyi bye brag bshad par bya'o //
translated: Now, the specific vital points of the body will be explained.

original: gnad ni brgya las bdun lhag pa //
analyzed: gnad ni brgya las bdun lhag pa //
translated: There are more than one hundred and seven vital points.

original: de las bcu gcig brla dang ni //
analyzed: de las bcu gcig brla dang ni //
translated: Among them, there are eleven in each thigh,

original: de bzhin lag ngar gnyis so sor //
analyzed: de bzhin lag ngar gnyis so sor //
translated: and likewise in each forearm,

original: lto ba la gsum brang la dgu //
analyzed: lto ba la gsum brang la dgu //
translated: three in the abdomen, nine in the chest,

original: rgyab la bcu bzhi nam tshong ni //
analyzed: rgyab la bcu bzhi nam tshong ni //
translated: fourteen in the back,

original: yan chad sum cu rtsa bdun yod //🔽rkang pa'i mthil nas gung mo yi //
analyzed: yan chad sum cu rtsa bdun yod // rkang pa'i mthil nas gung mo yi //
translated: and above the collarbones there are thirty-seven.🔽From the soles of the feet to the middle finger,

original: thad ka na ni mthil 'phrog pa'i //
analyzed: thad ka na ni mthil 'phrog pa'i //
translated: in a straight line,

original: gnad yod ces ni rnam bshad de //
analyzed: gnad yod ces ni rnam bshad de //
translated: it is explained that there are vital points.

original: de phug gnad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de phug gnad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur //
translated: By piercing that, one will die.

original: mtheb sor dbus na rgya tshigs te //
analyzed: mtheb sor dbus na rgya tshigs te //
translated: In the middle of the thumb and the finger is the joint.

original: de phug bskyod pa'i gnad kyis 'chi //
analyzed: de phug bskyod pa'i gnad kyis 'chi //
translated: By piercing that, one will die by the key point of shaking.

original: de gong sor gnyis shes par bya //
analyzed: de gong sor gnyis shes par bya //
translated: One should know that above that are two fingers.

original: rkang pa la 'khar zhing 'dar bar byed //
analyzed: rkang pa la 'khar zhing 'dar bar byed //
translated: The feet are shaken and tremble.

original: long mo'i tshigs 'og pir mgo ste //
analyzed: long mo'i tshigs 'og pir mgo ste //
translated: Below the ankle joint is the brush head.

original: de bcad skrang dang nad skyed byed //
analyzed: de bcad skrang dang nad skyed byed //
translated: By cutting that, swelling and illness are produced.

original: byin pa rkang ba gnyis kyi bar //
analyzed: byin pa rkang ba gnyis kyi bar //
translated: Between the calves and the two feet

original: long mo gnad rengs bem por byed //
analyzed: long mo gnad rengs bem por byed //
translated: is the ankle joint, which paralyzes the body.

original: byin pa'i nang na nya zhes pa //
analyzed: byin pa'i nang na nya zhes pa //
translated: In the calf is the so-called fish,

original: khrag zad pa yis 'chi bar byed //
analyzed: khrag zad pa yis 'chi bar byed //
translated: which causes death by the exhaustion of blood.

original: byin pa brla mtshams bus mo ste //
analyzed: byin pa brla mtshams bus mo ste //
translated: The knee is between the calf and the thigh.

original: de phug gson yang 'theng por 'gyur //
analyzed: de phug gson yang 'theng por 'gyur //
translated: By piercing that, one will live but will limp.

original: pus gong sor gsum par gnyan gong //
analyzed: pus gong sor gsum par gnyan gong //
translated: The knee cap is three fingerbreadths above the knee.

original: de phug brla rengs skrang bar byed //
analyzed: de phug brla rengs skrang bar byed //
translated: By piercing that, the thigh is paralyzed and swells.

original: brla nang brla dbang zhes bya ba //
analyzed: brla nang brla dbang zhes bya ba //
translated: In the thigh is the so-called thigh lord.

original: de phug khrag zags brla bskam 'gyur //
analyzed: de phug khrag zags brla bskam 'gyur //
translated: By piercing that, blood flows out and the thigh dries up.

original: brla rtsa mig dmar zhes bya ba //
analyzed: brla rtsa mig dmar zhes bya ba //
translated: The thigh channel is called red eye.

original: khrag zad pas ni gzhogs phyed 'joms //
analyzed: khrag zad pas ni gzhogs phyed 'joms //
translated: By the exhaustion of blood, half the body is destroyed.

original: brla rtsa rlig pa'i bar gyi gnad //
analyzed: brla rtsa rlig pa'i bar gyi gnad //
translated: The vital point between the thighs and the testicles

original: ljon shing zhes bya ma ning byed //
analyzed: ljon shing zhes bya ma ning byed //
translated: Is called the “tree” and is the “eunuch.”

original: de dag brli'o dpung de bzhin //🔽mkhrig ma 'di ni long mor mtshungs //
analyzed: de dag brli'o dpung de bzhin // mkhrig ma 'di ni long mor mtshungs //
translated: Those two are the thighs, and the arms are similar.

original: gru mo byin 'dra de gnyis phug //
analyzed: gru mo byin 'dra de gnyis phug //
translated: The elbow is like the hip, and the two are hollow.

original: zha bo ljon shing 'dra ba ni //
analyzed: zha bo ljon shing 'dra ba ni //
translated: The cripple is like a tree.

original: mchan khung nang na mchan khung 'dzin //
analyzed: mchan khung nang na mchan khung 'dzin //
translated: The armpit is inside the armpit.

original: @118b de phug zha po nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: @118b de phug zha po nyid du 'gyur //
translated: If that is hollow, it becomes a cripple.

original: long ka'i gnad ni gzang zhes bya //
analyzed: long ka'i gnad ni gzang zhes bya //
translated: The vital point of the groin is called the “ox.”

original: de phug gzang rlung gis 'phral gsod //
analyzed: de phug gzang rlung gis 'phral gsod //
translated: If that is hollow, the ox wind will kill instantly.

original: ldang ba gzhu ltar yo ba yi //

analyzed: rtsa chen gnad ni rnam dgu ste //
translated: There are ten on the front side: the two hands, the two

analyzed: rtsa la gnas gnad sum cu bdun //

analyzed: rtsa chen gnyis dang ma mo sngo //

analyzed: 'gram pa mchan khung 'dzin sprul mgo //

original: 'gro dang stan gnas nus pa chung //
analyzed: 'gro dang stan gnas nus pa chung //
translated: One is unable to walk, sit, or lie down,

original: dbang po nyams pa'am 'chi bar 'gyur //
analyzed: dbang po nyams pa'am 'chi bar 'gyur //
translated: and the senses deteriorate or death occurs.

original: rtsa chen gnad bcad sbu ba dang // sgra bcas 'byung zhing dran nyams 'gyur //🔽rtsa yi gnad bcad khrag ska zhing //
analyzed: rtsa chen gnad bcad sbu ba dang // sgra bcas 'byung zhing dran nyams 'gyur // rtsa yi gnad bcad khrag ska zhing //
translated: If the vital points of the large channels are severed, there is a popping sound and loss of memory.

original: rgyun mi 'chad par mang du 'byung //🔽de zad mgo 'khor dbugs mi bde //
analyzed: rgyun mi 'chad par mang du 'byung // de zad mgo 'khor dbugs mi bde //
translated: If the vital points of the channels are severed, there is a constant flow of blood.🔽When that is exhausted, there is dizziness, dyspnea,

original: skom rmongs skyigs bus 'debs bas 'chi //
analyzed: skom rmongs skyigs bus 'debs bas 'chi //
translated: thirst, confusion, and death by choking.

original: lus ni gra ma lta bus khyab //
analyzed: lus ni gra ma lta bus khyab //
translated: The body becomes covered with goose bumps,

original: 'tsho ba kyang sgur po'am 'theng por 'gyur //
analyzed: 'tsho ba kyang sgur po'am 'theng por 'gyur //
translated: and one lives as a hunchback or a cripple.

original: tshigs gnad stobs dang spyod pa nyams //
analyzed: tshigs gnad stobs dang spyod pa nyams //
translated: The power and function of the joints are impaired.

original: lus skem tshigs ni skrang bar 'gyur //🔽lte ba mur 'gram bdag po gzang //
analyzed: lus skem tshigs ni skrang bar 'gyur // lte ba mur 'gram bdag po gzang //
translated: The body becomes emaciated and the joints swell.🔽The navel, temples, and the lord of the body

original: snying dang chu so sum mdo ris //
analyzed: snying dang chu so sum mdo ris //
translated: are the ribs, heart, and the three channels.

original: ma mo brgyad dang bcu dgu po //
analyzed: ma mo brgyad dang bcu dgu po //
translated: The eight and the nineteen mamos

original: 'phral du srog ni gcod par byed //
analyzed: 'phral du srog ni gcod par byed //
translated: immediately take away life.

original: de rnams 'phral du mi 'chi yang //
analyzed: de rnams 'phral du mi 'chi yang //
translated: Even if they do not die immediately,

original: zhag bdun gyis ni nges par 'chi //🔽rengs bral mthil 'phrog rtsib logs mtshams //
analyzed: zhag bdun gyis ni nges par 'chi // rengs bral mthil 'phrog rtsib logs mtshams //
translated: they will certainly die within seven days.🔽The joints, the soles, the sides, the boundaries,

original: rked pa can gzhon mtshams kyi mtha' //🔽nu rtsa dbang po chu so'i gnad //
analyzed: rked pa can gzhon mtshams kyi mtha' // nu rtsa dbang po chu so'i gnad //
translated: the waist, the young joints, the boundaries,🔽the channels, the sense organs, and the channels of the body🔽are the thirty-three vertebrae, the great channels,

original: rgyab tshigs mi gsal rtsa chen dang // ro smad nu mjing sum cu gsum //
analyzed: rgyab tshigs mi gsal rtsa chen dang // ro smad nu mjing sum cu gsum //
translated: and the lower torso, breasts, and neck.

original: zla ba'am zla phyed son nas ni //
analyzed: zla ba'am zla phyed son nas ni //
translated: When they reach the month or half-month,

original: dus gzhan du ni 'chi bar byed //
analyzed: dus gzhan du ni 'chi bar byed //
translated: they will die at another time.

original: brdeg dang gzhag bzhes bya gsum //
analyzed: brdeg dang gzhag bzhes bya gsum //
translated: There are three: striking, resting, and so on.

original: der ni zug rngu byung gyur na //
analyzed: der ni zug rngu byung gyur na //
translated: If a pain occurs there,

original: rlung gis sha dang tshil dang rkang //🔽glad rgyas rnams ni skems par byed //
analyzed: rlung gis sha dang tshil dang rkang // glad rgyas rnams ni skems par byed //
translated: the wind dries up the flesh, fat, and bones,🔽and the membranes of the brain.

original: mtshon phyung lud pa dbugs mi bde //
analyzed: mtshon phyung lud pa dbugs mi bde //
translated: The phlegm is expelled, and there is dyspnea.

original: 'byung zhing srog ni 'joms par 'gyur ;🔽/ sbrul mgo mig zur rna rtsa dang // sngon po 'gram gnas ltag pa'i gnad //
analyzed: 'byung zhing srog ni 'joms par 'gyur ; / sbrul mgo mig zur rna rtsa dang // sngon po 'gram gnas ltag pa'i gnad //
translated: The life-force will be destroyed.🔽The vital points of the eyes, ears, and throat are at the corners of the eyes,🔽the vital points of the shoulders and so forth are at the shoulders,

original: phrag pa'am phrag stsogs 'khyil pa dang // ljon shing brla dbang khung bu dang // mig dmar pus mo'i gnad dang bcas //
analyzed: phrag pa'am phrag stsogs 'khyil pa dang // ljon shing brla dbang khung bu dang // mig dmar pus mo'i gnad dang bcas //
translated: the vital points of the thighs and knees are at the thighs,

original: mtshan 'dzin pir dra gru mo'i gnad //
analyzed: mtshan 'dzin pir dra gru mo'i gnad //
translated: and the vital points of the wrists and elbows are at the wrists.

original: de ltar gnad ni bzhi bcu bzhis //🔽rkang lag 'jas par byed 'gyur ba'am //
analyzed: de ltar gnad ni bzhi bcu bzhis // rkang lag 'jas par byed 'gyur ba'am //
translated: Thus, there are forty-four vital points.🔽If the arms and legs become stiff,

original: gal te tshabs cher snad gyur na //
analyzed: gal te tshabs cher snad gyur na //
translated: or if there is severe injury,

original: des ni srog kyang 'joms par ped //
analyzed: des ni srog kyang 'joms par ped //
translated: the life-force will be destroyed.

original: phir mgo 'dra dang long mo dang // mkhrig ma'i gnad brgyad nad tshabs skyed //
analyzed: phir mgo 'dra dang long mo dang // mkhrig ma'i gnad brgyad nad tshabs skyed //
translated: The eight vital points of the head, ankles, and wrists produce severe illness.

original: de las ljon shing mchan khung 'dzin //
analyzed: de las ljon shing mchan khung 'dzin //
translated: Among them, the vital point of the tree is held in the armpit.

original: @120b brla dang pir mgo lta bu ste //
analyzed: @120b brla dang pir mgo lta bu ste //
translated: The vital points of the thighs and the head are like a brush.

original: bcu gnyis sor gcig tshad yin no //
analyzed: bcu gnyis sor gcig tshad yin no //
translated: They are twelve finger-breadths in length.

original: mkhrig ma dang ni long mo dang // nu ma'i rtsa ba sor gnyis tshad //
analyzed: mkhrig ma dang ni long mo dang // nu ma'i rtsa ba sor gnyis tshad //
translated: The vital points of the wrists, ankles, and the base of the breasts are two finger-breadths in length.

original: pus mo gru mo sor gsum tshad //
analyzed: pus mo gru mo sor gsum tshad //
translated: The vital points of the knees and elbows are three finger-breadths in length.

original: gzhang dang chu so lte ba snying //
analyzed: gzhang dang chu so lte ba snying //
translated: The anus, the urethra, the navel, and the heart,

original: sngon po mtshams mtha' ma mo dang / pir 'dra sum mdo ris 'gram pa gnad ni nyi shu dgu yi tshad //
analyzed: sngon po mtshams mtha' ma mo dang / pir 'dra sum mdo ris 'gram pa gnad ni nyi shu dgu yi tshad //
translated: The blue, the intermediate, the last, the female, the brush-like, the fork, and the cheek are the twenty-nine vital points.

original: rang gi lag mthil tshad yin no //
analyzed: rang gi lag mthil tshad yin no //
translated: The remaining vital points are the size of one’s palm.

original: lhag ma gnad ni lnga bcu drug //
analyzed: lhag ma gnad ni lnga bcu drug //
translated: The remaining vital points are thirty-six,

original: sor phyed kyi ni tshad du 'dod //🔽gzhan dag gnad de til 'bru ste /
analyzed: sor phyed kyi ni tshad du 'dod // gzhan dag gnad de til 'bru ste /
translated: The size of half a finger joint.🔽Others say that the vital points are the size of a sesame seed,

original: 'bras tsam gyi ni tshad du 'dod //
analyzed: 'bras tsam gyi ni tshad du 'dod //
translated: Or the size of a grain.

original: rtsa bzhir bshad pa gang yin pa //
analyzed: rtsa bzhir bshad pa gang yin pa //
translated: Those that are explained as the four channels

original: lus kun brtas par byed pa rnams //
analyzed: lus kun brtas par byed pa rnams //
translated: Are the ones that nourish the entire body.

original: de ni gnad la gnas pa yin //
analyzed: de ni gnad la gnas pa yin //
translated: They are the vital points.

original: des ni de phug khrag drag 'byung //
analyzed: des ni de phug khrag drag 'byung //
translated: If they are pierced, there will be a strong flow of blood.

original: lus zungs rnams ni zad pa'i phyir //🔽rlung 'phel nad ni mi bzang 'debs //
analyzed: lus zungs rnams ni zad pa'i phyir // rlung 'phel nad ni mi bzang 'debs //
translated: Because the body’s constituents are exhausted,🔽The increase of wind causes an incurable illness.

original: rlung gis mkhris pa rgyas par byed //
analyzed: rlung gis mkhris pa rgyas par byed //
translated: The wind increases the bile.

original: mkhris pa rgyas par gyur pas na //
analyzed: mkhris pa rgyas par gyur pas na //
translated: When the bile increases,

original: skom dang mgo 'khor skam dang myos //
analyzed: skom dang mgo 'khor skam dang myos //
translated: There is thirst, dizziness, dryness, and confusion.🔽The body sweats, the joints separate, the body relaxes,

original: lus rdul tshigs dbye lus lhod dang // de ni gshin rje'i dbang du 'gro //
analyzed: lus rdul tshigs dbye lus lhod dang // de ni gshin rje'i dbang du 'gro //
translated: And one goes under the power of the Lord of Death.

original: gnad gcod na ni myur ba ru //
analyzed: gnad gcod na ni myur ba ru //
translated: If the vital points are struck, [the patient] will die quickly.

original: lus kyi tshigs ni chos 'gyur te //
analyzed: lus kyi tshigs ni chos 'gyur te //
translated: The joints of the body are the Dharma channels.

original: tshigs kyi phyogs su bcad pas na //
analyzed: tshigs kyi phyogs su bcad pas na //
translated: When they are struck on one side,

original: rtsa ni 'khums par byed pa yin //
analyzed: rtsa ni 'khums par byed pa yin //
translated: the channels are constricted.

original: de la srog chags rnams kyi srog //
analyzed: de la srog chags rnams kyi srog //
translated: In them, the life of living beings

original: khrag gnas na ni gnas pa //
analyzed: khrag gnas na ni gnas pa //
translated: is located, and so is the blood.

original: yin ; / de bas gnad min legs phog na //
analyzed: yin ; / de bas gnad min legs phog na //
translated: Therefore, if [the blood] is struck in a non-vital point,

original: nges par 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nges par 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: death is not certain.

original: 'ga' zhig smin pa'i yon tan dang // phyogs gcig tu ni phog pa yis //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig smin pa'i yon tan dang // phyogs gcig tu ni phog pa yis //
translated: If [the blood] is struck in a vital point,

original: 'cho bar gyur kyang de yi ni //
analyzed: 'cho bar gyur kyang de yi ni //
translated: even if it is not fatal,

original: dbang bo mtshang nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: dbang bo mtshang nyid du 'gyur //
translated: it will become a weakness of the sense faculties.

original: de bas 'bad de gnad du ni //
analyzed: de bas 'bad de gnad du ni //
translated: Therefore, one should avoid striking the vital points

original: thal sman me btsa' la sogs spang //
analyzed: thal sman me btsa' la sogs spang //
translated: with unctuous medicine, cauterization, and so forth.

original: gnad du phog na chung dus kyang //
analyzed: gnad du phog na chung dus kyang //
translated: Even if [the blood] is struck in a minor way,

original: phal cher shin tu gnod pa yin //🔽de bzhin gnad la brten pa'i nad //
analyzed: phal cher shin tu gnod pa yin // de bzhin gnad la brten pa'i nad //
translated: it will usually cause great harm.🔽Likewise, one should treat with great effort

original: rab tu 'bad pas gso bar bya //🔽yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las //
analyzed: rab tu 'bad pas gso bar bya // yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las //
translated: diseases that are based in the vital points.

original: lus kyi gnas kyi le'u bzhi pa'o /
analyzed: lus kyi gnas kyi le'u bzhi pa'o /
translated: This concludes the fourth chapter, on the locations of the body, from The Essence of Eight Branches.

original: // / de nas lus kyi 'gyur ba'i bye brag shes par bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: // / de nas lus kyi 'gyur ba'i bye brag shes par bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o //
translated: Now, the chapter on the knowledge of the specific changes of the body will be explained.

original: ji ltar 'bras bu me tog dang // me yi du ba char gyi sbrin //
analyzed: ji ltar 'bras bu me tog dang // me yi du ba char gyi sbrin //
translated: Just as the fruit, the flower, the fire, the smoke, and the cloud

original: phyis 'byung mtshan ma yin pa ltar //
analyzed: phyis 'byung mtshan ma yin pa ltar //
translated: are signs of what will come later,

original: de bzhin 'chi ltas las nges 'chi //
analyzed: de bzhin 'chi ltas las nges 'chi //
translated: so the signs of death are certain from the signs of death.

original: 'chi ltas med na mi 'chil //
analyzed: 'chi ltas med na mi 'chil //
translated: If there are no signs of death, one will not die.

original: 'chi ltas snang na @121a * //
analyzed: 'chi ltas snang na @121a * //
translated: If the signs of death appear,

original: 'tsho mi 'gyur //🔽'chi ltas 'chi ltas mi shes pa //
analyzed: 'tsho mi 'gyur // 'chi ltas 'chi ltas mi shes pa //
translated: one will not live.🔽Those who do not know the signs of death

original: mi mkhas 'chi ltas med min shes //🔽la la rten dang brten pa po'i //
analyzed: mi mkhas 'chi ltas med min shes // la la rten dang brten pa po'i //
translated: are unwise and think there are no signs of death.🔽Some assert these two

original: khyad par gyis de gnyis su 'dod //
analyzed: khyad par gyis de gnyis su 'dod //
translated: through the distinction of the support and the supported.

original: nad kyi tshul ni mang po las //
analyzed: nad kyi tshul ni mang po las //
translated: From among the many ways of illness,

original: 'chi lta tshul du 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: 'chi lta tshul du 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: the way of death will occur.

original: nad zhin ni zhi 'gyur la / brtan par gnas na 'chi bar 'gyur //
analyzed: nad zhin ni zhi 'gyur la / brtan par gnas na 'chi bar 'gyur //
translated: If the illness is pacified, but one remains firm, one will die.🔽The form, the sense faculties, the voice, the complexion,🔽the reflection, the action, and so on,

original: gzugs dang dbang po skad dang mdog / gzugs brnyan bya ba sogs pa dang // dngos po dag ni gzhan la yang //
analyzed: gzugs dang dbang po skad dang mdog / gzugs brnyan bya ba sogs pa dang // dngos po dag ni gzhan la yang //
translated: and also other things

original: tha mal pa las rgyu med par //
analyzed: tha mal pa las rgyu med par //
translated: without a cause from the ordinary

original: gzhan du gyur gnag mdor gang ni //
analyzed: gzhan du gyur gnag mdor gang ni //
translated: And the other is the dark.🔽

original: 'chi ltas yin par de shes bya //🔽skra dang ba spu ma bskus par //
analyzed: 'chi ltas yin par de shes bya // skra dang ba spu ma bskus par //
translated: The opposite of these is known as the signs of death.🔽When the hair and body hair appear as if🔽oiled, without having been oiled,🔽when the eyes move about,

original: snum gyis bskus ltar gang snang dang // gang zhig mig ni rab g-yo dang // mi 'gyur phyir 'byung khung bur zhugs //
analyzed: snum gyis bskus ltar gang snang dang // gang zhig mig ni rab g-yo dang // mi 'gyur phyir 'byung khung bur zhugs //
translated: and when the nose is drawn in and the mouth open,🔽when the body is bent, twisted, and hunched over,🔽when the eyebrows are lowered,🔽when there is confusion, loss of vision,

original: yo dang bgrad dang 'jums ba dang // bcu ma zhing smin ma smad pa dang // 'khrul dang mthong ba nyams pa dang // se mo'i mig ltar lta ba dang // thi ba 'dra dang mgal me 'dra //
analyzed: yo dang bgrad dang 'jums ba dang // bcu ma zhing smin ma smad pa dang // 'khrul dang mthong ba nyams pa dang // se mo'i mig ltar lta ba dang // thi ba 'dra dang mgal me 'dra //
translated: and when the eyes look like those of a cat, a pigeon, or a fire-brand,🔽when tears flow, the nose is runny,🔽the nose is very open,🔽and the body is covered with moles and freckles,🔽when the body is emaciated, the clothes dirty,

original: mchi ma 'dzag cing rdzim 'khrugs / sna ni shin tu gdangs pa dang // zhom dang 'brum phan gyis khyab dang / skyang dang gos dang snyid pa dang / gang gi ma mchu 'phyangs pa dang // yam chu gyen la brjes pa dang // gnyi ga 'dzam bu smin 'drar snang //
analyzed: mchi ma 'dzag cing rdzim 'khrugs / sna ni shin tu gdangs pa dang // zhom dang 'brum phan gyis khyab dang / skyang dang gos dang snyid pa dang / gang gi ma mchu 'phyangs pa dang // yam chu gyen la brjes pa dang // gnyi ga 'dzam bu smin 'drar snang //
translated: and the lips are drooping,🔽when the uvula is turned upward,🔽and both lips appear like ripe jambū fruits,🔽when the teeth are black and uneven,

original: so gnag gseg mar bcas pa dang // dmar zhing so zho nag nog can //
analyzed: so gnag gseg mar bcas pa dang // dmar zhing so zho nag nog can //
translated: red, and covered with tartar,🔽and when the teeth are loose,

original: glo bur du ni 'byung ba dang // lo ni yo dang rtag tu 'byin //
analyzed: glo bur du ni 'byung ba dang // lo ni yo dang rtag tu 'byin //
translated: crooked teeth, and always dripping.🔽Swollen, dry, heavy, and dark,

original: skrang dang skam dang lci dang gnag / gos dang rtsub dang tshor ba med //
analyzed: skrang dang skam dang lci dang gnag / gos dang rtsub dang tshor ba med //
translated: covered, rough, and without sensation.🔽The neck cannot support the head,

original: mjing pas mgo ni mi thig dang ; ; rang gi lhag rgyab khur ltar lci //
analyzed: mjing pas mgo ni mi thig dang ; ; rang gi lhag rgyab khur ltar lci //
translated: and the back is heavy like a burden.

original: 'gram pas khan gnas pa yi //
analyzed: 'gram pas khan gnas pa yi //
translated: The cheeks are sunken,

original: kha zas blad par mi nub pa //
analyzed: kha zas blad par mi nub pa //
translated: and food cannot be swallowed.

original: gang zhig rgyu med par yan lag / shin tu lci ba'am shin tu yang /🔽dgu dang snad pa med par ni //
analyzed: gang zhig rgyu med par yan lag / shin tu lci ba'am shin tu yang / dgu dang snad pa med par ni //
translated: If any limb becomes extremely heavy or light without cause,🔽and if the body is not injured,🔽but blood comes out of the orifices,🔽if the penis retracts,

original: bu ga rnams las khrag 'byung dang // gang zhig pho mtshan nub pa dang // rlig pa rab tu 'phyangs ba'am / de las go log gyur ba rnams //
analyzed: bu ga rnams las khrag 'byung dang // gang zhig pho mtshan nub pa dang // rlig pa rab tu 'phyangs ba'am / de las go log gyur ba rnams //
translated: if the testicles hang down, or if the opposite occurs,

original: thams cad 'chi bdag dbang gyur yin //
analyzed: thams cad 'chi bdag dbang gyur yin //
translated: all of these are under the sway of the Lord of Death.

original: gang gi rtsa ris sngon me dpar //
analyzed: gang gi rtsa ris sngon me dpar //
translated: If the veins are like a previous fire

original: zla ba tshes pa ltar bu ni //
analyzed: zla ba tshes pa ltar bu ni //
translated: or like a crescent moon,

original: 'phral ba'am chu so'i steng na gnas //
analyzed: 'phral ba'am chu so'i steng na gnas //
translated: located on the forehead or above the kidneys,

original: de ni zla drug las mi 'tsho //🔽lus can @121b //
analyzed: de ni zla drug las mi 'tsho // lus can @121b //
translated: that person will not live more than six months.🔽If the body of a living being

original: gang gi lus la chu //
analyzed: gang gi lus la chu //
translated: is covered with water,

original: padma'i 'dab ma lta bur ni //
analyzed: padma'i 'dab ma lta bur ni //
translated: Like the petals of a lotus,

original: rgyal tshe chu ni mi chags pa //
analyzed: rgyal tshe chu ni mi chags pa //
translated: the water does not stick to the body of the king.

original: de ni zla ba drug na 'chi / spyi bo du'am snum bcas snang //
analyzed: de ni zla ba drug na 'chi / spyi bo du'am snum bcas snang //
translated: If a new mole appears on the crown of the head or between the eyebrows,🔽or if the hair of the crown of the head or the topknot is disheveled,

original: de ni zla ba gcig na 'chi //
analyzed: de ni zla ba gcig na 'chi //
translated: he will die in one month.

original: spyi bo'am smin mtshams gsar du ni //
analyzed: spyi bo'am smin mtshams gsar du ni //
translated: If the crown of the head or the forehead is suddenly

original: mtshams bye ba'am gtsug 'khyil snang //
analyzed: mtshams bye ba'am gtsug 'khyil snang //
translated: covered with moles or a topknot appears,

original: nad med zhag ni drug gis 'chi / nad pa zhag gsum na 'chi 'gyur //
analyzed: nad med zhag ni drug gis 'chi / nad pa zhag gsum na 'chi 'gyur //
translated: he will die in six days if healthy, in three days if sick.🔽One should abandon those whose tongues are black, whose mouths smell,🔽whose right eyes are sunken,

original: lce gnag kha ni mnam pa dang // mig g-yas phugs su bros ba'am / bya ni mgol bas pa dag / gang yin de ni yongs su spangs //🔽gang zhig khrus byas byugs pa dang // los kun gsher bar gnas bzhin du //
analyzed: lce gnag kha ni mnam pa dang // mig g-yas phugs su bros ba'am / bya ni mgol bas pa dag / gang yin de ni yongs su spangs // gang zhig khrus byas byugs pa dang // los kun gsher bar gnas bzhin du //
translated: or whose heads are pecked at by birds.🔽If the heart dries up very quickly🔽while bathing and anointing the body

original: snying ga shin tu myur bar bskams //
analyzed: snying ga shin tu myur bar bskams //
translated: and while the entire body is still wet,

original: de ni zla phyed las mi 'cho //
analyzed: de ni zla phyed las mi 'cho //
translated: he will not live beyond a half month.🔽If the complexion of the entire body suddenly deteriorates

original: glo bur du ni lus kun mdog / cig car tha ma la pa las nyams //
analyzed: glo bur du ni lus kun mdog / cig car tha ma la pa las nyams //
translated: at the end of the summer,

original: de bzhin nad ni sogs pa dang // rtsub dang snum 'gyur 'chi ba yin //
analyzed: de bzhin nad ni sogs pa dang // rtsub dang snum 'gyur 'chi ba yin //
translated: and if the body becomes rough and oily, he will die.

original: gong gi sor mo drangs pa dang // sgra mi 'byung ba de mi 'tsho //
analyzed: gong gi sor mo drangs pa dang // sgra mi 'byung ba de mi 'tsho //
translated: If the fingers are drawn up and there is no sound, he will not live.

original: de bzhin lud pa sbrid stsogs la //
analyzed: de bzhin lud pa sbrid stsogs la //
translated: Likewise, if there is phlegm, sneezing,

original: gang zhig sngon med sgra byung ba'am //
analyzed: gang zhig sngon med sgra byung ba'am //
translated: if a sound occurs that did not occur before,

original: dbugs 'byin thung ba'am ring ba'am //
