translated: It immediately seizes the life-force, and one is immediately afflicted by fever and contagious disease.

original: skom dad brgyal dang stobs zad dang // tshig mtshams bral bar gyur pa rnams //
analyzed: skom dad brgyal dang stobs zad dang // tshig mtshams bral bar gyur pa rnams //
translated: Thirst, fainting, loss of strength, and loss of speech

original: nye bar 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: nye bar 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin //
translated: are the signs of impending death.

original: nang par gnag gi gdong las ni //🔽rdul nas shas cher 'dzag 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: nang par gnag gi gdong las ni // rdul nas shas cher 'dzag 'gyur zhing //
translated: In the morning, from the face of the one who is to die,🔽dust and tears flow abundantly.

original: khar chags rims kyis gdungs pa rnams //
analyzed: khar chags rims kyis gdungs pa rnams //
translated: If one is afflicted by contagious disease in the mouth,

original: de yang 'tsho bar dka' ba yin //
analyzed: de yang 'tsho bar dka' ba yin //
translated: it is also difficult to live.

original: gang gi lus la 'brum phran ni //
analyzed: gang gi lus la 'brum phran ni //
translated: If on the body of the one who is to die

original: byi ru'i mdog 'dra snang gyur pa //
analyzed: byi ru'i mdog 'dra snang gyur pa //
translated: small boils appear, the color of coral,🔽and

original: byung nas myur du mi snang gyur //
analyzed: byung nas myur du mi snang gyur //
translated: Having appeared, they quickly disappear.

original: de ni ring por mi thogs 'chi //
analyzed: de ni ring por mi thogs 'chi //
translated: They will die before long.

original: 'brum pa sran chung bshus 'dra zhing //
analyzed: 'brum pa sran chung bshus 'dra zhing //
translated: Like a pea being removed from a pod,

original: de bzhin byi ru'i mdog 'dra ba //
analyzed: de bzhin byi ru'i mdog 'dra ba //
translated: and likewise, like the color of coral,

original: nang du kha blta tshad 'brum 'dra //
analyzed: nang du kha blta tshad 'brum 'dra //
translated: looking inside, the boils are like the size of a pea.

original: 'brum bus lus ni 'jig byed yin //
analyzed: 'brum bus lus ni 'jig byed yin //
translated: Boils destroy the body.

original: mig ser gdong ser rgyas pa dang // mur 'gram gnyis kyi sha zad pa //
analyzed: mig ser gdong ser rgyas pa dang // mur 'gram gnyis kyi sha zad pa //
translated: Jaundice, yellow face, and swelling, and wasting of the flesh of both temples,🔽frightened, and the body is hot,

original: skrag cing lus ni tsha bdag / gang yin de ni spangs bar bya //
analyzed: skrag cing lus ni tsha bdag / gang yin de ni spangs bar bya //
translated: whatever it is, it should be abandoned.

original: rgyu med phrugs pa dag las rma //
analyzed: rgyu med phrugs pa dag las rma //
translated: Without cause, the wound is scratched,🔽increasing and spreading,

original: 'phel zhing mched par byed pa dang // rlung skyed gang yin na ba med //
analyzed: 'phel zhing mched par byed pa dang // rlung skyed gang yin na ba med //
translated: producing wind, whatever it is, it is not a disease.

original: mkhris pa las gyur tsha ba med //
analyzed: mkhris pa las gyur tsha ba med //
translated: From bile, there is no heat.🔽From phlegm, there is no pus,

original: bad kan las gyur rnag med dang // gang zhig nad skyed zug gzer med //
analyzed: bad kan las gyur rnag med dang // gang zhig nad skyed zug gzer med //
translated: and whatever produces disease, there is no pain.

original: phye mas khyab dang rnying par snang //
analyzed: phye mas khyab dang rnying par snang //
translated: Pervaded by dust, it appears old.

original: gang du glo bar dag tu ni //
analyzed: gang du glo bar dag tu ni //
translated: Wherever there is space,

original: rgyal mtshan ma dung la sogs gzugs snang //
analyzed: rgyal mtshan ma dung la sogs gzugs snang //
translated: the form of a victory banner, conch, and so forth appear.

original: rma de thams cad spangs bar bya //
analyzed: rma de thams cad spangs bar bya //
translated: All those wounds should be abandoned.

original: mtshan par rdol na bshang gcig rlung //
analyzed: mtshan par rdol na bshang gcig rlung //
translated: If the anus is torn, there is a single flatus.🔽If the patient is eaten by worms,🔽if the knees are separated,🔽if the foot is lifted and falls,

original: 'byung zhing srin bus gces pa dang // pus mo phan tshul 'byer ba dang // rkang ba bteg nas ltung gyur dang // yang dang yang du kha bsgyur ba'i //
analyzed: 'byung zhing srin bus gces pa dang // pus mo phan tshul 'byer ba dang // rkang ba bteg nas ltung gyur dang // yang dang yang du kha bsgyur ba'i //
translated: if the patient is repeatedly turned over,

original: nad pa de ni 'tsho mi 'gyur //
analyzed: nad pa de ni 'tsho mi 'gyur //
translated: he will not live.

original: so yis sen mo'i rtse gcod cing //
analyzed: so yis sen mo'i rtse gcod cing //
translated: If the patient bites the tip of the nail with the teeth,🔽if he cuts the hair or the veins with the nail,🔽if he scratches the ground with a stick,🔽if he beats the donkey with his fist,🔽if the hair stands on end,

original: sen mos skra'am rtsa gcod dang // sa la shing bus 'dri ba dang ; ; bong pas ba rdeg pa dang // spu ldang cin ni bska ba dang // lud pa bskams shing rims kyis 'debs //
analyzed: sen mos skra'am rtsa gcod dang // sa la shing bus 'dri ba dang ; ; bong pas ba rdeg pa dang // spu ldang cin ni bska ba dang // lud pa bskams shing rims kyis 'debs //
translated: if the sputum dries up and he is afflicted by fever,

original: skad cig dgod cing spyugs glu len //
analyzed: skad cig dgod cing spyugs glu len //
translated: if he laughs and cries from moment to moment,🔽if he kicks his mother with his foot,

original: ma la la rkang bas rdeg pa dang // skad cig re res bu gsol //
analyzed: ma la la rkang bas rdeg pa dang // skad cig re res bu gsol //
translated: if he sucks his finger from moment to moment,

original: nad pa gang yin de mi 'tsho //
analyzed: nad pa gang yin de mi 'tsho //
translated: the patient will not live.🔽If a mole, a pimple, or a freckle appears on the face,

original: @125b gdong la sme ba ngo khabs dang // mdzer skyes so sen thig le chags //
analyzed: @125b gdong la sme ba ngo khabs dang // mdzer skyes so sen thig le chags //
translated: if a pustule or a black spot forms on the teeth or nails,

original: lto la sna tshogs rtsa snang ba //
analyzed: lto la sna tshogs rtsa snang ba //
translated: if various veins appear on the stomach,

original: glo bur byung ba de mi 'tsho / gyen du dbugs rtseg drod yal zhing //
analyzed: glo bur byung ba de mi 'tsho / gyen du dbugs rtseg drod yal zhing //
translated: the upper breath is labored, the body heat is lost,

original: brlang brag gnyis su gzer gyis nyen //
analyzed: brlang brag gnyis su gzer gyis nyen //
translated: and the two sides of the body are pierced by pain.

original: dpal dang rnam par bral gyur pa //
analyzed: dpal dang rnam par bral gyur pa //
translated: If the person is completely devoid of splendor,

original: blo dang ldan pas yongs su sbang //
analyzed: blo dang ldan pas yongs su sbang //
translated: the wise should abandon him.🔽If the illness increases

original: gang gi nad ni 'phel 'gyur dang // rang bzhin yongs su nyams pa ni //
analyzed: gang gi nad ni 'phel 'gyur dang // rang bzhin yongs su nyams pa ni //
translated: and the natural state is completely lost,

original: gang la 'phral du 'byung gyur pa //
analyzed: gang la 'phral du 'byung gyur pa //
translated: and if these occur suddenly,

original: de ni mod la 'chi bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de ni mod la 'chi bar 'gyur //
translated: the person will die immediately.

original: sman bas nad pa gnag zhig la / sman gyi bya ba byas gyur pa //
analyzed: sman bas nad pa gnag zhig la / sman gyi bya ba byas gyur pa //
translated: If a physician performs medical treatment for a patient

original: 'bad kyang sos par ma gyur na //
analyzed: 'bad kyang sos par ma gyur na //
translated: and the patient does not recover despite the effort,🔽the wise should abandon him,

original: de yid srog ni rnyed par dga' mkhas shing mang du grub pa dang // cho ga bzhin du byin gyur yang //
analyzed: de yid srog ni rnyed par dga' mkhas shing mang du grub pa dang // cho ga bzhin du byin gyur yang //
translated: even if he is skilled and has many accomplishments.

original: sman gyi bya ba ma grub gang /
analyzed: sman gyi bya ba ma grub gang /
translated: If the medical treatment is not successful🔽despite being administered according to the rules,

original: de la gso ba'i thabs med dod //
analyzed: de la gso ba'i thabs med dod //
translated: there is no method of cure for him.

original: gang gis sman ni sbyor ba'i tshe //
analyzed: gang gis sman ni sbyor ba'i tshe //
translated: When the medicine is being prepared,

original: rgyu med par ni phyin ci log //
analyzed: rgyu med par ni phyin ci log //
translated: if there is an error without a cause,

original: mdog dang ro stsogs logs gyur na //
analyzed: mdog dang ro stsogs logs gyur na //
translated: if the color, taste, and so forth are altered,

original: nad med yin yang de mi 'tsho //
analyzed: nad med yin yang de mi 'tsho //
translated: the person will not survive, even if he is healthy.

original: gang gi gnas su shing bcas med /
analyzed: gang gi gnas su shing bcas med /
translated: If there is no tree in the place where it was,

original: rlung med kyang ni shin 'gyur dang / nad pa gang gi khyim du ni //
analyzed: rlung med kyang ni shin 'gyur dang / nad pa gang gi khyim du ni //
translated: and if there is no wind, but the patient still shakes,🔽and if in the house of the patient

original: snod ni shin tu mang po dag / chag gam lhang bar gyur pa na //
analyzed: snod ni shin tu mang po dag / chag gam lhang bar gyur pa na //
translated: many vessels break or fall,

original: de yi srog ni snye par dga' //
analyzed: de yi srog ni snye par dga' //
translated: then his life is in danger.

original: mi gang nyam chung gyur ba yang //
analyzed: mi gang nyam chung gyur ba yang //
translated: If a weak person

original: glo bur sos par snang 'gyur ba //
analyzed: glo bur sos par snang 'gyur ba //
translated: suddenly appears to be healthy,🔽then his life is uncertain,

original: de yi srog kyang ma nges pa / yin par rgyan shes bus bshad do //
analyzed: de yi srog kyang ma nges pa / yin par rgyan shes bus bshad do //
translated: as Jivaka has explained.

original: nye du mdza' bo rnams kyis ni //
analyzed: nye du mdza' bo rnams kyis ni //
translated: Even if relatives and friends

original: dris kyang mnyan par mi bya la //
analyzed: dris kyang mnyan par mi bya la //
translated: ask him, he will not listen;

original: sman pas smra bar mi bya zhing /
analyzed: sman pas smra bar mi bya zhing /
translated: the physician will not speak,

original: de yi gso ba'ang khas mi blang //🔽gshin rje'i pho nya sha za stsogs //
analyzed: de yi gso ba'ang khas mi blang // gshin rje'i pho nya sha za stsogs //
translated: and he will not accept treatment.

original: gzhan gyis nye bar bsten pa gang //
analyzed: gzhan gyis nye bar bsten pa gang //
translated: If he is attended by others,🔽such as the flesh-eating messengers of the Lord of Death,

original: sman gyis stobs ni 'joms pas na /
analyzed: sman gyis stobs ni 'joms pas na /
translated: since the medicine destroys his strength,

original: de phyir de ni yongs su spangs //
analyzed: de phyir de ni yongs su spangs //
translated: he should be completely abandoned.

original: tshe yi rig byed 'bras bu kun //
analyzed: tshe yi rig byed 'bras bu kun //
translated: All the results of the Ayurveda

original: tshe shes pa la gnas pa yin //
analyzed: tshe shes pa la gnas pa yin //
translated: reside in the knowledge of life.

original: de bas 'chi ltas gnas pa kun /
analyzed: de bas 'chi ltas gnas pa kun /
translated: Therefore, all the signs of death

original: sman pas 'bad de shes par bya //
analyzed: sman pas 'bad de shes par bya //
translated: The physician should understand this through effort.

original: tshe dang bsod na mas gnyi ga zad //
analyzed: tshe dang bsod na mas gnyi ga zad //
translated: Both life and merit are exhausted.

original: de gnyis zad par ma gyur yang //
analyzed: de gnyis zad par ma gyur yang //
translated: Even if those two are not exhausted,🔽it is explained that living beings are sick because the light

original: yang ba ni ma spangs pas / srog chags rnams na 'che bar bshad //
analyzed: yang ba ni ma spangs pas / srog chags rnams na 'che bar bshad //
translated: has not been abandoned.

original: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las /
analyzed: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las /
translated: From the Essence of the Eight Branches

original: lus kyi gnas kyi li'u lda pa'o /
analyzed: lus kyi gnas kyi li'u lda pa'o /

translated: Now, the messengers of the body and so forth should be explained.

original: las ni 'grub par bshad / de las go bzlog pho nya ni //
analyzed: las ni 'grub par bshad / de las go bzlog pho nya ni //
translated: It is explained that they are accomplished from the practice of the🔽heteropraxis, and the opposite of that is the messenger.🔽It is explained that the signs of accomplishment are not from

analyzed: bkra mi shis pa'i ming dang ldan //
translated: having inauspicious names,

original: sdig las bud med dri ma can //
analyzed: sdig las bud med dri ma can //
translated: sinful women, with stains,🔽many, sick, ugly,

analyzed: mang po nad pa mi sdug dang // phreng ba byug pa dmar pos brgyan //

analyzed: til mar 'dam bskus gos snying dang // mdog ngan rlan can gos gcig gon // bong bu rnga mo ma he zhon //

analyzed: shing dang bong ba nyed pa dang // ring nas 'bod pa'i pho nya 'ongs //

original: sman pas yongs su spangs bar bya //

analyzed: drang srong rnams kyis shis par bshad // de ltar 'di ni skye dang 'chi //

original: 'gyur byed sdug bsngal ma zhu'i skyon //
analyzed: 'gyur byed sdug bsngal ma zhu'i skyon //

analyzed: zad byed 'tsho dka' mkhun gnod skyed //

original: ming gi rnam grangs sgras bshad do //
analyzed: ming gi rnam grangs sgras bshad do //

original: nad gzhi sngar byung tshul dang ni //
analyzed: nad gzhi sngar byung tshul dang ni //

analyzed: de bzhin tshul phyed goms byed dang // dkyel gyur shes par byed pa ste //

original: nad ni rnam pa lngar shes bya //
analyzed: nad ni rnam pa lngar shes bya //

analyzed: gzhi dang rgyu dang skye mched dang // rkyen dang slong bar byed pa'i rgyu //

analyzed: rnam grangs kyis ni nad gzhi bshad //

original: gang gis sngar byung tshul shes pas //
analyzed: gang gis sngar byung tshul shes pas //

original: nad ni 'byung bar 'dod gyur la //
analyzed: nad ni 'byung bar 'dod gyur la //

original: bye brag phyed par ma gyur ba //
analyzed: bye brag phyed par ma gyur ba //

analyzed: nad kyi tshul ni ji bzhin par //

analyzed: chung phyir mtshan nyid mi gsal ba'o //

analyzed: de nyid gsal ba nyid gyur pa //

analyzed: tshul phyed pa zhes bya bar bshad //

analyzed: sman dang zas @129a * //

analyzed: dang spyod lam rnams //

analyzed: de ni goms pa zhes byar bshad //

analyzed: de las bzlog pa'i ma goms nad //

analyzed: mi 'phrod nad ces bya ba'o //

analyzed: gang gis nad ni dkyil gyur pas //

analyzed: so gnyin mtshan zas zhu'i rjes //

analyzed: mkhris pa tsha dang sgyur dang rna //

analyzed: lan tshva bro dang lus tsha dang // ston ka nyin phyed mtshan phyed dang // tsha ba'i dus su ldang bar 'gyur //

analyzed: nyin par gnyid log brtas drags dang // slon stsogs sbyor ba nyes pa dang // zos ma thag dang dpyid kyi dus //

analyzed: snga dro mtshan stod bad kan ldang // 'dres pa las ni ldan pa yin //

analyzed: be'u snabs nad 'khrugs ri rtsar gnas //

analyzed: nad kyi gnas su 'gro byed pa //

analyzed: rtsa sbubs rnams su phyin pa dang // nad rnams lus la myur du skyed // yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las //

original: nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u dang po'o /
analyzed: nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u dang po'o /
translated: This concludes the first chapter, on the location of the diseases, from this Ornament of the Intent: A Compendium of the Eight Branches of the Ayurveda.

original: // / de nas rims nad kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o //

translated: contagious fever arises from manifest conditions.

original: 'dir gdon rgyu med dgod cing du //
analyzed: 'dir gdon rgyu med dgod cing du //
translated: Here, spirits are said to be without cause, and they cry and laugh.

original: sman gyi dri bskyed brgyal ba dang // sbid pa glad nad skrangs par 'gyur //
analyzed: sman gyi dri bskyed brgyal ba dang // sbid pa glad nad skrangs par 'gyur //
translated: [If] the smell of medicine causes fainting, swelling of the head, and fever.

original: dug las brgyal dang tshad par 'khru //🔽mdog nag lus tsha snying nad 'byung //
analyzed: dug las brgyal dang tshad par 'khru // mdog nag lus tsha snying nad 'byung //
translated: From poison, fainting and fever.🔽[If] the complexion is dark, the body hot, and there is heart disease.

original: khros pas lus 'dar glad nad 'gyur //
analyzed: khros pas lus 'dar glad nad 'gyur //
translated: From anger, trembling of the body and head disease.

original: mya ngan 'jigs las bla bar 'gyur //
analyzed: mya ngan 'jigs las bla bar 'gyur //
translated: From grief and fear, swelling of the head.

original: 'dod las mgo 'khor yid 'tshus tsha //
analyzed: 'dod las mgo 'khor yid 'tshus tsha //
translated: From desire, dizziness and mental anguish.

original: ngo tsha gnyid blo brtan nyams 'gyur //
analyzed: ngo tsha gnyid blo brtan nyams 'gyur //
translated: From shame, loss of sleep, and stability of mind.

original: gdon la sogs pa 'dus pa'i rims //
analyzed: gdon la sogs pa 'dus pa'i rims //
translated: The contagious fevers caused by evil spirits and so forth,

original: 'jig tshogs gsum ni rlung gi rims //
analyzed: 'jig tshogs gsum ni rlung gi rims //
translated: The three types of contagious fevers are wind-related.

original: khro las mkhris pa ldang bar 'gyur //
analyzed: khro las mkhris pa ldang bar 'gyur //
translated: From anger, bile arises.

original: dmod pa byad byas las byung gang //
analyzed: dmod pa byad byas las byung gang //
translated: Whatever arises from cursed actions,

original: 'dus pa'i rims ni mi bzad pa //
analyzed: 'dus pa'i rims ni mi bzad pa //
translated: The unbearable contagious fever,

original: de ni shin tu bzod dkar bshad //
analyzed: de ni shin tu bzod dkar bshad //
translated: Is said to be extremely difficult to bear.

original: de la byad byas sngags kyis ni //
analyzed: de la byad byas sngags kyis ni //
translated: In that case, by the mantra of the curse,

original: sbyin sreg byas pa bzhin du byas //
analyzed: sbyin sreg byas pa bzhin du byas //
translated: It is done as if by a fire offering.

original: thog mar sems 'bab de 'og lus //
analyzed: thog mar sems 'bab de 'og lus //
translated: First, the mind is disturbed, then the body,

original: de nas thor bu mgo 'khor skom //
analyzed: de nas thor bu mgo 'khor skom //
translated: Then suddenly, dizziness and thirst.

original: tsha bcas brgyal bas zin gyur ba'i //
analyzed: tsha bcas brgyal bas zin gyur ba'i //
translated: [If] one is seized by fever and fainting,

original: rims ni nyin re bzhin du 'phel //
analyzed: rims ni nyin re bzhin du 'phel //
translated: The fever increases day by day.

original: de ltar rims ni brgyad du bcas //
analyzed: de ltar rims ni brgyad du bcas //
translated: Thus, the fevers are classified as eight.

original: @131b de dag mdor na rnam gnyis te //
analyzed: @131b de dag mdor na rnam gnyis te //
translated: In brief, they are of two types:

original: lus dang sems kyi rims dang ni //
analyzed: lus dang sems kyi rims dang ni //
translated: physical and mental fevers.

original: grang dang tsha dang phyi nang gnas //
analyzed: grang dang tsha dang phyi nang gnas //
translated: Cold and hot, external and internal,🔽natural and acquired, curable and incurable,

original: rang bzhin dang ni gyur ba dang // gsor rung gsor mi rung ba dang // smin dang ma smin zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin dang ni gyur ba dang // gsor rung gsor mi rung ba dang // smin dang ma smin zhes bya'o //
translated: and ripe and unripe.

original: lus rims thog mar lus tsha byed //
analyzed: lus rims thog mar lus tsha byed //
translated: The physical fever first causes heat in the body.

original: sems kyi dang por snying tsha 'gyur //
analyzed: sems kyi dang por snying tsha 'gyur //
translated: The mental fever first causes heat in the heart.

original: rlung dang bad kan cig car ni //🔽'byung tshe grang ba'i rims su 'gyur //
analyzed: rlung dang bad kan cig car ni // 'byung tshe grang ba'i rims su 'gyur //
translated: When wind and phlegm occur simultaneously,🔽it becomes a cold fever.

original: mkhris pa dang ldan tsha ba ste //
analyzed: mkhris pa dang ldan tsha ba ste //
translated: When associated with bile, it is hot;

original: 'dres pas 'dres pa'o nang gnas pa //🔽rims nad dkyel ni bskyed 'gyur nas //
analyzed: 'dres pas 'dres pa'o nang gnas pa // rims nad dkyel ni bskyed 'gyur nas //
translated: when mixed, it is mixed. The internal fever🔽produces a spreading rash,

original: nang na na zhing bshang gci sri //
analyzed: nang na na zhing bshang gci sri //
translated: and one suffers internally with constipation and diarrhea.🔽The external fever is hot,

original: phyi rol rims ni tsha ba dang // phyi rol gnas pa gso bar sla //
analyzed: phyi rol rims ni tsha ba dang // phyi rol gnas pa gso bar sla //
translated: and the external fever is easy to cure.

original: dbyer dang ston dang dpyid dus su //
analyzed: dbyer dang ston dang dpyid dus su //
translated: In the rainy, autumn, and spring seasons,

original: rlung stsogs rim 'byung rang bzhin rims //
analyzed: rlung stsogs rim 'byung rang bzhin rims //
translated: the fevers of wind and so forth occur in sequence.

original: gzhan du gyur pa de gso dka' //
analyzed: gzhan du gyur pa de gso dka' //
translated: The one that has changed is difficult to cure.

original: phal cher rlung ni rang bzhin rims //
analyzed: phal cher rlung ni rang bzhin rims //
translated: Most of the time, the wind is naturally contagious.

original: yin yang gso bar dka' ba yin //
analyzed: yin yang gso bar dka' ba yin //
translated: However, it is difficult to cure.

original: dbyar dus rlung nad ldang 'gyur na //
analyzed: dbyar dus rlung nad ldang 'gyur na //
translated: If a wind disease arises in the summer,

original: mkhris pa bad kan ldan rims 'gyur //
analyzed: mkhris pa bad kan ldan rims 'gyur //
translated: it becomes a fever with bile and phlegm.

original: ston ka mkhris bas nad slong ste //
analyzed: ston ka mkhris bas nad slong ste //
translated: In autumn, bile increases the disease,

original: bad kan de yi grogs byed 'gyur //
analyzed: bad kan de yi grogs byed 'gyur //
translated: and phlegm acts as its ally.

original: der ni smyung ba byas gyur kyang //
analyzed: der ni smyung ba byas gyur kyang //
translated: Even if fasting is done there,

original: gnod par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gnod par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: it will not be harmful.

original: bad kan byed ldan de yang ni //
analyzed: bad kan byed ldan de yang ni //
translated: That phlegm-dominant one also

original: de rjes rlung dang mkhris pa 'byung //
analyzed: de rjes rlung dang mkhris pa 'byung //
translated: is followed by wind and bile.

original: nyams stobs che zhing nad tshabs chung //
analyzed: nyams stobs che zhing nad tshabs chung //
translated: With great vitality and little disease,

original: bla brnan med rims gso bar sla //
analyzed: bla brnan med rims gso bar sla //
translated: without complications, the contagious fever is easy to cure.

original: rnam kun 'gyur bzhes bya bar ;
analyzed: rnam kun 'gyur bzhes bya bar ;
translated: The one called all-changing

original: ; gsor mi rung ba sngar bshad do //🔽rims kyi nad tshabs tshe zhing tsha //
analyzed: ; gsor mi rung ba sngar bshad do // rims kyi nad tshabs tshe zhing tsha //
translated: is incurable, as explained before.🔽The signs of contagious fever with little strength and life

original: khong rmya nyam chung gcin mang dang // bshang sri kha zas mi 'ju la //🔽bkres chung ma smin rims mtshan nyid //
analyzed: khong rmya nyam chung gcin mang dang // bshang sri kha zas mi 'ju la // bkres chung ma smin rims mtshan nyid //
translated: are emaciation, weakness, excessive urination,🔽constipation, indigestion,🔽little hunger, and unripeness.🔽The signs of contagious fever with great strength and power

original: rims shugs stobs che skom dad che //
analyzed: rims shugs stobs che skom dad che //
translated: are great thirst,

original: bla zhing mgo 'khor dbugs mi bde //
analyzed: bla zhing mgo 'khor dbugs mi bde //
translated: The signs of ripening are:🔽the head feels heavy, is dizzy, and breathing is labored,

original: bshang gci bder 'byung nad bskyod pa //
analyzed: bshang gci bder 'byung nad bskyod pa //
translated: and feces and urine are easily passed.

original: smin par 'gyur pa'i mtshan ma yin //
analyzed: smin par 'gyur pa'i mtshan ma yin //
translated: The signs of unripening are the opposite,🔽and it is said that the disease will ripen in seven days.

original: ma smin go bzlog mtshan nyid dang // zhag bdun smyung byas las smin bshad //
analyzed: ma smin go bzlog mtshan nyid dang // zhag bdun smyung byas las smin bshad //
translated: Fever is explained as fivefold:

original: rims ni nad kyi dus dang ni //🔽stobs chung che las rnam lngar bshad //
analyzed: rims ni nad kyi dus dang ni // stobs chung che las rnam lngar bshad //
translated: according to the time of the disease,

original: phal cher 'dus par gyur ba yi //
analyzed: phal cher 'dus par gyur ba yi //
translated: and according to the strength of the patient.🔽It is said that fever is mostly

original: rims su mang du 'gyur bar bshad //
analyzed: rims su mang du 'gyur bar bshad //
translated: a combination of many [ailments].

original: rgyun dang rtag pa nyin gcig pa //
analyzed: rgyun dang rtag pa nyin gcig pa //
translated: [There are] intermittent, constant, daily,

original: nyin gsum pa dang nyin bzhi ba'o //🔽lus zungs bshang gci rgyu ba yi //
analyzed: nyin gsum pa dang nyin bzhi ba'o // lus zungs bshang gci rgyu ba yi //
translated: every third day, and every fourth day [fevers].🔽The body is pervaded by the

original: bu gnad kyis khyab byas pas //
analyzed: bu gnad kyis khyab byas pas //
translated: channels that carry the bodily constituents, feces, and urine.

original: lus kun tsha bar gyur nas ni //
analyzed: lus kun tsha bar gyur nas ni //

original: gnod bya stsogs dang mnyam par 'phel //
analyzed: gnod bya stsogs dang mnyam par 'phel //

original: stobs che lus lci rkang lag rengs //
analyzed: stobs che lus lci rkang lag rengs //
translated: [The patient] has a strong fever, a heavy body, and stiff arms and legs.

original: khyad par du ni @132a * //
analyzed: khyad par du ni @132a * //
translated: In particular,

original: dangs mar gnas //
analyzed: dangs mar gnas //
translated: the fever abides in the pure essence.

original: gnyen pos bcos dka' bzod par dka' //
analyzed: gnyen pos bcos dka' bzod par dka' //
translated: It is difficult to treat with remedies and difficult to bear.

original: rgyun gyi rims su 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: rgyun gyi rims su 'gyur ba yin //

original: de yi drod kyis dri ma dang // lus zungs myur du zad par byed //
analyzed: de yi drod kyis dri ma dang // lus zungs myur du zad par byed //

original: de 'og rnam kun lus zungs stsogs //
analyzed: de 'og rnam kun lus zungs stsogs //
translated: After that, all bodily constituents and so forth

analyzed: dag pa'am ma dag rims kyis ni //
translated: are either purified or not purified gradually.

analyzed: rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan zhag / bdun nam bcu'am bcu gnyis gnas //
translated: The wind, bile, and phlegm remain for seven, ten, or twelve days,

original: phal cher mtshams las mi 'da' bar //
analyzed: phal cher mtshams las mi 'da' bar //
translated: mostly not exceeding the boundary.

original: 'tsho ba'am 'chi ba dag tu byed //

original: de skad me bzhin 'jug gis bshad //
analyzed: de skad me bzhin 'jug gis bshad //

original: ljang sngon gyis ni bshad pa'i gzhung //
analyzed: ljang sngon gyis ni bshad pa'i gzhung //

original: bdun pa nyis bldab gyur ba yin //
analyzed: bdun pa nyis bldab gyur ba yin //

analyzed: de bzhin dgu dang bcu gcig bldab ;
translated: Similarly, it is doubled for the ninth and eleventh.

original: ;'di ni nad gzhi gsum gyis tshigs //
analyzed: ;'di ni nad gzhi gsum gyis tshigs //

original: 'tsho dang 'chi 'bar byed pa yin //
analyzed: 'tsho dang 'chi 'bar byed pa yin //

original: rims dus dag dang ma dag las //
analyzed: rims dus dag dang ma dag las //
translated: From the pure and impure times of fever,

analyzed: yun rings dus su gnas pa yin //

analyzed: nad rtse zhil ba nyam chung dang // kha zas mi 'phrod stsogs bsten pas //

original: gnyen por bcas shing 'phel 'bri gnas //

original: mi bzad pa ni nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: mi bzad pa ni nyid du 'gyur //

original: de rnams kyis ni nad kyi stobs //
analyzed: de rnams kyis ni nad kyi stobs //

original: stobs che chung las ldog bar byed //
analyzed: stobs che chung las ldog bar byed //

original: nad zad rims ni phrar gyur pa ;
analyzed: nad zad rims ni phrar gyur pa ;
translated: When the disease is exhausted, the fever becomes subtle

analyzed: ; bcud la sogs pa nyid la thim //

original: thim pas lus ring sha mdog nyams nyams //

original: rmongs bag la sogs de yis skyed //
analyzed: rmongs bag la sogs de yis skyed //

original: nye ni ba ni bye ba'i phyir //
analyzed: nye ni ba ni bye ba'i phyir //

original: dangs ma rgyu ba'i rtsa sgo las //
analyzed: dangs ma rgyu ba'i rtsa sgo las //

original: las kun myur du khyab pa ni //
analyzed: las kun myur du khyab pa ni //

original: nad kyis skye bar byed pa yin //
analyzed: nad kyis skye bar byed pa yin //

original: des na rgyun du rtag rims 'gyur /
analyzed: des na rgyun du rtag rims 'gyur /

original: de las bzlog pa tshul mi 'dra //
analyzed: de las bzlog pa tshul mi 'dra //

original: mi snyoms rtsol ba mi mnyam pa //
analyzed: mi snyoms rtsol ba mi mnyam pa //

original: bya ba'i dus min mnyam yun ring //
analyzed: bya ba'i dus min mnyam yun ring //
translated: and for a long time not at the time of action.🔽That arises twice a day and night,

analyzed: de ni nyin mtshan lan gnyis ldang // gzhan dag nyin re lan re yin //

original: phal cher nad ni khrag la brten //
analyzed: phal cher nad ni khrag la brten //

original: rtag pa'i rims ni byed par 'gyur //
analyzed: rtag pa'i rims ni byed par 'gyur //

analyzed: de yang nyid mtshan lan gnyis ldang // nyin gcig nyin re lan re ldang // de ni sha yi rtsa la brten //

original: gsum pa tshil gyi rtsa la gnas //
analyzed: gsum pa tshil gyi rtsa la gnas //

original: mkhris pa rlung gnyis spyi nas 'dzin //
analyzed: mkhris pa rlung gnyis spyi nas 'dzin //
translated: The bile and wind [type] is held in common.

original: bad kan mkhris gyur sum mdo na //
analyzed: bad kan mkhris gyur sum mdo na //

original: rlung dang bad kan rgyab nas 'dzin //
analyzed: rlung dang bad kan rgyab nas 'dzin //

original: de ni zhag gcig gis chod yin //
analyzed: de ni zhag gcig gis chod yin //

analyzed: nyin bzhi pa'i rims @132b nad tshil dang // rkang dang rus pa'i nang na gnas //

original: gzhan dag tshil nyid la gnas zer //
analyzed: gzhan dag tshil nyid la gnas zer //

original: de yi nus pa bstan pa ni //
analyzed: de yi nus pa bstan pa ni //
translated: The demonstration of its power is as follows:

original: bad kan gyis ni byin gnyis na //
analyzed: bad kan gyis ni byin gnyis na //
translated: Phlegm causes pain in the two buttocks.

original: rlung gis klad pa na bar byed //
analyzed: rlung gis klad pa na bar byed //

original: rus rkang gnyis kar zhugs pa yin //
analyzed: rus rkang gnyis kar zhugs pa yin //

original: nyin bzhi pa ni go bzlog pa'o //
analyzed: nyin bzhi pa ni go bzlog pa'o //

original: nyin gsum pas ni nyin gnyis na //
analyzed: nyin gsum pas ni nyin gnyis na //

original: nyin cig na bar mi byed do //
analyzed: nyin cig na bar mi byed do //
translated: The one-day fever does not cause pain.

original: nad rnams kyi ni stobs che chung ;
analyzed: nad rnams kyi ni stobs che chung ;

original: ; zas dang spyod pa las 'byung zhing //
analyzed: ; zas dang spyod pa las 'byung zhing //

original: de bzhin rims rnams 'byung ba ni //
analyzed: de bzhin rims rnams 'byung ba ni //

original: yid dang las las skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: yid dang las las skye bar 'gyur //

analyzed: nad kyis lus zungs dkrugs gyur pa //

original: nad sos nyi tshe zhu bar 'gyur //
analyzed: nad sos nyi tshe zhu bar 'gyur //

original: de tshe nad ba dbugs drag rdul //
analyzed: de tshe nad ba dbugs drag rdul //

analyzed: mkhun zhing slon byed 'gre ba dang // lus 'dar tshig mang tshab dang // lus grang bzhin mdog nyams pa dang ; ; dran stor rims kyi shugs kyis gzir //
translated: And the memory is lost, oppressed by the force of fever.🔽Looking with an angry manner,

original: khros pa'i tshul gyis lta ba dang // bshang ba nad dang sgrar bcas pa //
analyzed: khros pa'i tshul gyis lta ba dang // bshang ba nad dang sgrar bcas pa //
translated: Feces, urine, and flatus

original: sla ba shugs drag 'byung ba yin //
analyzed: sla ba shugs drag 'byung ba yin //
translated: Occur easily with strong force.

original: yid ni sor gnas rdul sbrid bder 'byung yig 'byed //
analyzed: yid ni sor gnas rdul sbrid bder 'byung yig 'byed //
translated: The mind remains steady, and the urge to sneeze arises.

analyzed: mgo bo g-ya' ba rims nad 'byang ba'i mtshan ma yin // yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las //
translated: Itching of the head is a sign of recovery from contagious fever.

original: nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u gnyis pa'o /
analyzed: nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u gnyis pa'o /
translated: This concludes the second chapter, on the location of the humors, from this Ornament of the Heart of Medicine.

analyzed: // / de nas khrag dang mkhris pa dang lud pa'i nad gzhi bshad par bya'o //

original: rab dro rab rno tsha dang skyur //
analyzed: rab dro rab rno tsha dang skyur //
translated: Hot, sharp, bitter, and sour,🔽salty and so forth, hot foods,

original: lan tshva la sogs tsha ba dang // khre rgod autpa la yi zas //
analyzed: lan tshva la sogs tsha ba dang // khre rgod autpa la yi zas //

translated: and by birds.🔽One dreams of climbing heaps of hair, bones, and ashes,🔽and of empty lands and towns,

original: phung po la ni 'dzegs pa dang // yul dang grong ni stong pa dang // chu klung skams par rmi lam mthong //
analyzed: phung po la ni 'dzegs pa dang // yul dang grong ni stong pa dang // chu klung skams par rmi lam mthong //
translated: and of dried-up rivers.🔽One dreams of the moon and stars falling,

original: skar mnga' ri bo ltung ba dang // ljon shing rnams ni 'bar ba rmi //
analyzed: skar mnga' ri bo ltung ba dang // ljon shing rnams ni 'bar ba rmi //
translated: and of trees blazing.

original: stod du gnas na cham pas 'debs //
analyzed: stod du gnas na cham pas 'debs //
translated: If [the humor] is located above, one will contract a cold,

original: lud pa lu zhing dbugs mi bde //
analyzed: lud pa lu zhing dbugs mi bde //
translated: with phlegm, coughing, and dyspnea.🔽One will have pain in the shoulders and head,

original: phrag pa spyi bo na pa dang // skad 'gags yi ga 'chus par 'gyur //🔽smad gnas bshang sla rtug skem byed //🔽nang grol nang gnas slon par byed //
analyzed: phrag pa spyi bo na pa dang // skad 'gags yi ga 'chus par 'gyur // smad gnas bshang sla rtug skem byed // nang grol nang gnas slon par byed //
translated: hoarseness, and indigestion.🔽If [the humor] is located below, one will have diarrhea,🔽and will lose weight due to frequent urination.🔽If [the humor] is located in the middle, one will have pain in the ribs,

original: thad kar gnas pas rtsib logs zug / tshigs la gnas na rims su 'gyur //
analyzed: thad kar gnas pas rtsib logs zug / tshigs la gnas na rims su 'gyur //
translated: and if in the joints, one will contract a fever.

original: de ltar nad tshul bcu gcig ni //
analyzed: de ltar nad tshul bcu gcig ni //
translated: Thus, these eleven types of illness

original: gcong chen ldan las 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: gcong chen ldan las 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: arise from the presence of a great accumulation [of humors].

original: de rnams kyi ni bla brnan dag / skad 'gags brang du na ba dang // kha glal lus grugs mchil snabs mang //
analyzed: de rnams kyi ni bla brnan dag / skad 'gags brang du na ba dang // kha glal lus grugs mchil snabs mang //
translated: hoarseness, pain in the chest, yawning, trembling of the body, and much mucus and phlegm.

original: drod nyams kha mnam yin shes bya //
analyzed: drod nyams kha mnam yin shes bya //
translated: One should know that a loss of body heat and a bad smell are the symptoms of a combination of all three humors.

original: de la rlung gyur klad pa dang // rtsib logs zug sha yan lag na //
analyzed: de la rlung gyur klad pa dang // rtsib logs zug sha yan lag na //
translated: If the disorder is a wind-phlegm combination, there will be pain in the head, sides, and limbs.

original: skad 'gags mgul pa subs par 'gyur //🔽mkhris rgyas rkang lag phrag pa tsha /
analyzed: skad 'gags mgul pa subs par 'gyur // mkhris rgyas rkang lag phrag pa tsha /
translated: The voice will be hoarse and the throat will be blocked.🔽If it is a bile-phlegm combination, there will be a burning sensation in the hands, feet, and shoulders.

original: / tshad 'khru khrag tu slon pa dang / kha mnam rims 'debs myos par 'gyur //🔽bad kan las gur yi ga 'chus //
analyzed: / tshad 'khru khrag tu slon pa dang / kha mnam rims 'debs myos par 'gyur //🔽bad kan las gur yi ga 'chus //
translated: There will be a fever, vomiting of blood, a bad smell in the mouth, and one will be afflicted by contagious diseases and insanity.🔽If it is a wind-bile-phlegm combination, there will be a loss of appetite and a feeling of heaviness in the body.
